loans.name: Sean

texts.en:
Sean’s passion for building and construction began when he was a child who he loved creating and building structures out of blocks and legos. Fascinated by the architecture of his hometown, Chicago, Sean always knew he wanted to build structures and houses. 

As an adult, Sean’s passion for seeing a project through and building something of value propelled him into the construction business.  Sean honed his trade working on extensive reconstruction and repair of Navy barracks.  He reflects that his time there taught him just how important your team is and how important it is for each member to work hard.

In January 2011, Sean started his own construction firm, fulfilling his lifelong dream of becoming an entrepreneur.  Almost two and a half years later, Sean's business has grown and expanded, providing Sean with the opportunity to positively affect the lives of many individuals and their families.  For Sean, the best part of his job is providing quality service in home renovation that not only creates a beautiful new space, but also restores and protects the special memories of the homeowner.  

A loan of $7,332.90 will enable Sean to purchase equipment necessary to expand his construction business further.  Sean will also use the loan to pursue a public works contract in San Diego to restore historic San Diego buildings.  This is a huge growth opportunity for Sean and his business. 

In the future, Sean hopes to grow his business to the point where he can add jobs to the community and mentor younger generations in his trade.  Currently, Sean hires three part-time contractors as needed, but with further expansion, he can hire full-time employees and achieve his dream of passing on his craft.

video.title: Kiva Borrower Sean from United States

loans.use: to purchase necessary equipment and pursue a public works contract.

loans.name: Kaddi

texts.en:
Kaddi is from the Kisauni area. She is married to Charo, who is a fisherman. They have five children who all attend school. Kaddi's business is buying, producing and selling vegetables. She makes her sales to neighboring food stall operators and in Kisauni town market. She tells us that she has an established customer base which helps her to make a very good income and thereby help her family.

Kaddi is requesting a loan to buy vegetables such as tomatoes, peppers, onions, etc. She tells us that this will enable her to stock up and have a larger variety of products to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as tomatoes, peppers, onions, etc.

loans.name: Brígida Isabel

texts.es:
Brígida tiene 47 años de edad, esta acompañada y tiene una hija de 14 años de edad. Ella tiene 12 años de ser profesora, le gusta enseñar a los niños y jóvenes en la escuela.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para cancelar una deuda pendiente. De esta manera saldrá de sus compromisos financieros con tasas muy altas de interés; lo que le permitirá ahorrarse dinero. Su deseo es ayudar a su hija para que continúe con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Brígida is 47 years old.  She is in a relationship and she has a 14-year-old daughter.  She has been a teacher for 12 years.  She likes to teach the children and young people in the school.

The loan that she is requesting from Fundación Campo is to pay off an outstanding debt.  In this way she will get out of her financial commitments with very high interest rates and that will allow her to save money. 

Her wish is to help her daughter continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay off an outstanding debt.

loans.name: Davaasuren

texts.en: Davaasuren, 39, lives with her husband, son and mother in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. She has been babysitting one company's CEO's child since 2009. Her husband has been rendering taxi services to local people for many years and has accumulated a vast amount of experience. Her son studies at an agricultural university. Her mother has retired from work and gets a state pension. The house they live in has deteriorated over the years and needs some serious repair. Therefore, she is requesting a loan of 5000000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials such as bricks, cements, planks, fiberglass and foam. Using these materials, she and her husband can repair and insulate their house. The renovated house will enable the family to reduce their coal consumption, release less pollutants, thereby contributing to efforts against air pollution. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials.

loans.name: Aimable

texts.en: Aimable is 42 years old. He is married with two children. He has requested a loan for buying more construction materials to sell. With the loan, he will add more iron sheets and nails for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay for the school fees for his children.

loans.use: To buy more iron sheets and nails to sell.

loans.name: Ukumbini

texts.en:
Ukumbini is married and has two school aged children. She is from Kisauni.  Ukumbini sells prepared foods, which she has been doing for five years. 

Ukumbini is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy a water tank for storing water to sell. She dreams of opening another location and providing a better future for her children.

loans.use: to purchase a water tank for storing water to sell.

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en: Claudine is 32 years old. She sells foodstuffs and has been in the business for the past five years. The loan for the business will be used to buy more bananas and rice for sale. The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: To buy more bananas and rice to sell.

loans.name: Irubgu

texts.en:
Irubgu is a hardworking and enterprising man who is getting ahead and makes an effort to grow. He has good experience with his barber shop because he has been doing it for over five years now. The previous loan allowed him to make many improvements and continue to grow. Irubgu’s goal is to continue expanding his business.

Irubgu is requesting another loan, which he will use to buy another hair cutting machine so he can continue his business.

loans.use: to purchase another hair cutting machine

loans.name: America

texts.es:
América, de 55  años de edad, está casada con Julio quien es empleado y padre de sus 2 hijos.  Juntos  están cómodamente instalados en su propia casa en compañía de su hijo menor de 12 años de edad respectivamente.América se dedica a la venta de comidas en las noches tales como pescado asado, tallarines y otros. Para eso instala una mesa en el frontis de su casa donde atiende muy amablemente a todos sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus vecinos y transeúntes de la zona. Comenta que ha suspendido temporalmente sus actividades por problemas de salud, pero lo estará retomando en el transcurso de las semanas.Lleva más de 06 años en éste negocio, empezando con un capital propio , considera a su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda que tiene ya que en su zona es muy conocida y solicitada, siendo sus vecinas quienes le piden que retome su negocio.Este será el préstamo número 06 con Kiva y está contenta de saber que contará con un apoyo financiero para concretar  sus planes , por tanto se compromete a ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles comprará utensilios para su negocio tales como ollas, vasos, platos, y otros, además de mesas y sillas.
texts.en:
América, 55 years old, is married to Julio who is employed and father of her two children. They live together in their own home with their youngest child who is less than 12 years old.

América works selling food in the evenings such as grilled fish, noodles, and more. To do this she sets up a table in front of her home where she offers friendly service to her customers, mainly her neighbors and passersby from the area. She says that she has temporarily suspended her activities due to health problems, but will be resuming in the coming weeks. She has been in this business for more than six years, beginning with her own capital. She considers the business very profitable because the need in her area is well known and sought after, and her neighbors are asking her to resume her business.

This will be her sixth loan through Kiva and she is happy to know that she will have financial support in order to carry out her plans, and she promises to be responsible for her loan payments.

With the requested amount of 1500 soles she will buy utensils for her business, such as pots, glasses, dishes, and more, as well as tables and chairs.

loans.use: to buy utensils such as pots, glasses, dishes, and more

loans.name: Francine

texts.en: Francine is 38 years old. She has sold bedsheets and bed covers for one year after shifting from selling construction materials. With the loan, she would like to buy more bedsheets for sale. The profits from the business will be used to provide food for the family.

loans.use: To buy more bedsheets for sale.

loans.name: Luiza

texts.en:
Luiza is 26 years old. She lives in Marneuli District with her 35-year-old husband and retired parents-in-law. 

Several times, Luiza requested a loan from local financial institutions for a family business start-up, but without any success. Her loan request was rejected each time because of low income and her family’s poor living conditions. 

Luiza’s husband is working for the water company. Her father-in-law is working as a security guard at the local stone factory. They both get small monthly salaries. The family's additional income comes from Luiza’s parents-in-law's monthly pensions. 

Luiza requested a loan from Credo to start-up a family business. Luiza has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to rural poor people, who do not have access to credit products. These rural poor people are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low income. 

With her credit, Luiza will purchase grocery stocks to open a grocery shop. She has already rented a commercial space, which is in a populous area. It will help Luiza to have a good number of clients and earn a good profit. Part of the profit will be reinvested in the same business, expanding the assortment of products in the shop. She will try to have all the necessary products that the locals need. 

The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva start-up loan, will significantly improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase grocery stocks to open a grocery shop.

loans.name: Alamdar

texts.en:
Alamdar is 49 years old, married and has four children: two sons and two daughters. His daughters go to school. His sons go to sport and music. He wants his daughters to become teachers. His wife stays at home, so he is the only one making an income. 

Alamdar is an IDP (internally displaced person) from Kalbadjar. Now he lives in the Absheron region with his family. He started his business five years ago to makes marble for cemeteries. Now Alamdar needs a 2,000 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) loan to buy new equipment for cutting marble. He wants to use the money from his expanded business to help his family. In the future, Alamdar wants to repair and increase the size of his workshop. This will be more profitable for his business. Alamdar is thankful to Komak and Kiva for supporting him.

loans.use: to buy new equipment for cutting marble for cemeteries.

loans.name: Douglas Antonio

texts.es: Douglas de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz, yuca y fríjol, tiene 7 años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, sus cosechas las comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; el necesita invertir por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, insecticida, herbicida, fertilizantes, etc. Douglas tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Douglas, 34 years old, lives with his life partner and three children in their own home. 

He works growing corn, yuca, and beans. He has been working in agriculture for seven years and this has given him lots of experience permitting him to grow better crops which he sells in the surrounding community areas. He has many customers who prefer the quality, good prices and above all his good service.

He needs to invest so he is asking for a loan in order to buy seeds, insecticide, herbicides, and fertilizer, etc.

Douglas has good references from associates and is responsible, and he is sure that he can pay off his loan in the established time frame and at the same time hopes to provide financial security for his household.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticide, herbicides, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema is a married woman with three children, all of whom still attend school and are still under her care. They live at their own house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees for the children.

Rehema has operated a clothes-selling business, selling at the market to the town residents and her neighbours. She cites her major challenge to be the rate of stock turnover which is affected by the seasons. 

With the loan she is requesting she wants to purchase two bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase two bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Jose Efrain

texts.es:
José,  tiene 25 años de edad, está casado y su esposa tiene 22 años de edad, disfruta de dos hijos en el cual uno de ellos, estudia parvularia. El se dedica a la ganadería, el cual lo compra y engorda; este oficio lo aprendió con un tío, cuenta con 5 años de poseerlo.
El crédito que requiere le permitirá comprar una ternera para engordarla, concentrado; este le ayudara a incrementar sus ingresos.
Su sueño es darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 25 years old, married, and his wife is 22.  He has two children and one of them goes to kindergarten.  He raises livestock, which he buys and fattens up.  He learned this from his uncle and has been doing this for five years.

He needs this loan so that he can buy a calf to fatten up and some feed.  This will help him increase his income.

His dream is to provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy a calf.

loans.name: Pendo

texts.en:
Pendo is a married mother living with her husband and two school aged children in Kisauni, Kenya. Her husband is a mason, while Pendo sells various brands of used clothing from her home to make a living. She is a very hardworking and entrepreneurial person who, together with her husband, overcomes obstacles that are presented to them. Thanks to their work, they are able to give their children what they need.

With the requested loan, Pendo will be able to purchase a greater quantity of clothing, and therefore be able to fulfill the needs and requests of her clients. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving to be able to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothing to sell

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
Luis, vive con su familia, su esposa que tiene 47 años de edad y sus hijos, los cuales tienen edades de 7, 15 y 27 años, todos trabajan y dependen del negocio. El posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, el cual lo realiza desde hace 20 años y todos los días, lo desempeña el trabajo en casa y a domicilio.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar lámina para puertas, hierro, asimismo para soldar, entre otros; este le ayudara a tener materia prima para llevar a cabo la actividad y así vender puertas, portones, balcones, entre otros.
Su sueño es ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y brindarles los estudios a sus hijos y nietos.
texts.en:
Luis lives with his family. His wife is 47 years old, and his children are 7, 15 and 27 years old, all of them working and depending on the business. 

He owns a metal shop where he has been working everyday for 20 years, carrying out his work at home and in residences.

The loan that he needs will permit him to buy sheet plates for doors, iron, and for welding too, and more. This will help him to have the raw supplies he needs to carry out his work so he can sell doors, gates, balconies, and more.

His dream is to provide a better quality of life for his family and to provide his children and grandchildren an education.

loans.use: to buy sheet plates for doors, iron, welding supplies, and more

loans.name: Dagoberto

texts.es: Dagoberto de 45 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos. Actualmente vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos tres hijos de 15, 9 y 7 años de edad quienes estudian actualmente, el es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultora siembra todos los años: maíz y maicillo. Dagoberto desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Dagoberto is 45 years old and is a very responsible man who maintains his household obligations. He is always described for bringing the best to his children. He lives with his partner and three children, aged 15, 9 and 7, all of whom are currently studying. 

He is very hard working and has always carried out his work with pleasure and enthusiasm. He makes a living as a farmer and plants corn and baby corn each year. Dagoberto hopes to increase his sales, which is why he visited INTEGRAL's offices to ask for a loan. This loan will allow him to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide and other supplies. He hopes to count on the support requested as he does not have other sources of income. In this way he will continue to be able to put food on the table each day without any problems.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Eric

texts.en: Eric is 38 years old and works in the construction industry. With this loan, he will buy more timber to sell. He also plans to use the profits he makes to purchase more timber for his business.

loans.use: To buy more timber to sell

loans.name: Racheal

texts.en:
Racheal is a married woman with four children who attend school. She is a tailor by profession and has a boutique in the center of town. Her main customers are teenagers and things are going very well for her because she always makes clothing that is innovative and well sought after. She would like to be able to continue expanding her boutique.

Rachael is asking for this loan so that she can invest in fabric and thread for her business. She wants to be able to continue working.

loans.use: buy fabric and thread for her business.

loans.name: Fozia

texts.en:
Fozia is 31 years old, married and the mother of two children. She lives in the rural area of Lahore, Pakistan. She belongs to a middle class family. Her husband is the only income source for the family, running a dyeing shop. His monthly income is inadequate to meet the household needs. He provides clothes-dyeing services in the community. 

Presently, he is in need of purchasing a clothes dyeing machine. Due to the lack of funds, he finds it difficult. Therefore, Fozia has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase the needed equipment for her husband's business. She hopes that the loan will be helpful for her husband. She wants to provide quality education to her children. She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To purchase a cloth-dyeing machine for her husband's dyeing shop.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is 47 years old and has four children.  She operates a fish and vegetable selling business, which she has been doing for 13 years. She sells her products in the village using a motorcycle. 

Janet is requesting a loan for 15,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase different fishes and vegetables. She is striving to provide for the needs of her family specially her children. She is certain that through the loan her income will increase.

loans.use: to purchase fish and vegetables

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia, de 38 años de edad, está casada con Israel quien se dedica al transporte y es padre de sus 05 hijos a quienes quiere mucho. Juntos están cómodamente instalados en su casa propia.La actividad que realiza Julia es la venta de golosinas de diversos sabores por la mañana razón por lo cual instala un tablero en el frontis de su casa  en donde atiende a sus clientes de manera amable y cordial.Se inició hace más de 2 años con un capital propio fruto de sus ahorros.Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le genera y por ser la única en la zona .Antes de empezar con su negocio, tenía los deseos de ser una persona productiva y generar sus propios ingresos para no depender completamente de su pareja y apoyarlos con los gastos de su hogar, además de poder estar en casa y atender a sus hijos menores.Este será el préstamo número 05 con Kiva y está contenta de saber que seguirá contando con el apoyo financiero necesario para concretar sus planes , además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.Con el monto solicitado de 300 nuevos soles comprará golosinas para su negocio tales como galletas , caramelos , chicles , entre otros .
texts.en:
Julia, 38 years old, is married to Israel who works in transportation. He is the father of her 5 children whom she loves very much. They live comfortably  together in their own home.

Julia sells different kinds of various flavored candy in the morning and she put a table in front of her home where she attends to her customers in a friendly and cordial manner. She began more than 2 years ago with her own capital from her savings. She considers her business very profitable because of the profit it generates and because she is the only one in the area.

Before she began her business, she had the desire to be a productive person and earn her own income and not to depend completely on her husband and to help provide for the household expenses. She also wanted to be at home and care for her young children.

This will be her 5th loan cycle with Kiva and she is happy knowing that she can continue counting on the necessary financial support to accomplish her plans, and she agrees to make her payments punctually.

With the requested amount of 300 soles she will buy sweets for her business such as cookies, caramels, gum, and more.

loans.use: to buy sweets such as cookies, caramels, gum, and more.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones, Actualmente vive junto a su madre y su hermana, es muy trabajador, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra maíz y fríjol. El cliente  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso solicita un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía que es donde siembra. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá ayudando en los gastos de su casa sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: This client is a responsible man who fulfills his obligations. He is currently living with his mother and sister, he is a hard worker, and he works in agriculture, planting corn and beans. This client wants to increase their sales and this is why he is asking for a credit that will allow him to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides, among other things, and to improve the terrain shown in the photograph where he does his planting. He hopes to be able to count on the help this credit represents because he has no other financial resources and this credit will help him to continue helping with household expenses without worrying about exceeding his financial limits.

loans.use: purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Bayanmunkh

texts.en: Bayanmunkh, 44 years old, lives with his wife and three children in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own small house on a plot of land. All three of his children go to high school. He has been rendering taxi service to local people for five years and during the summertime he also works at a construction site under contract with a building company. His wife grows and sells vegetables in her greenhouse. The greenhouse they used over the years has deteriorated due to its wooden construction. So, he is requesting a loan of 1500000 MNT to purchase iron plates in order to build an iron greenhouse on his land. As a result, their greenhouse will serve its purpose for many years and they can continue to grow vegetables without worrying. Growing vegetables is good for environment because plants convert carbon dioxide into oxygen. The borrower is a very hard-working individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to build a greenhouse made of iron

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu is married and has four children, three of whom attend school. For the past two years, she has operated a utensil and canvas rental business for weddings. She hires from home to her neighbors and passersby. Her major challenge in the business is high cost of transportation to her customers.

Saumu is requesting a loan from Yehu, which she will use to purchase more canvas and utensils for hiring to satisfy her clients. She joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family and school fees for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more canvas and utensils

loans.name: Raphael

texts.en: Raphael is 41 years old and married with one child. He sells trousers and has been in the business for the past six years. With the loan, he is planning to buy more trousers for sale. The profits from the business will be used to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for sale

loans.name: Feliciano De Jesus

texts.es: Feliciano, es muy amable y trabajador, vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, El trabaja muy duro tiene su propio corral donde cría pollos de engorde; pero aparte de eso se dedica a la siembra de yuca todos los años,  sus productos son de muy buena calidad comercializarla en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su lugar de residencia.  Feliciano solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de vitaminas y concentrado para pollo, él ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Feliciano is very friendly and hardworking. He lives with his wife and four children.

He works very hard. He has his own pen where he raises chickens for fattening, but apart from this he also cultivates yuca every year. His products are of very high quality and he sells in the various markets located near his home.

Feliciano is asking for a loan from Integral in order to have the necessary money to invest in the purchase of vitamins and chicken feed. He is eager to increase his sales in order to be able to earn higher profits and give his family better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and chicken feed.

loans.name: Patience

texts.en:
Patience is from Kisauni. She is married to a businessman and they have three children, who attend school, who are the couple's reason to struggle for success.

Patience has a business selling fruits and vegetables at the town market. She occupies two stands. She has a fixed customer base, good income, and good business and personal references. She is a hardworking woman and an excellent client.

She is asking for this loan to purchase fruits and vegetables to stock her store with products to be able to continue giving her customers the quality they expect from her.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables to stock her store with products

loans.name: Angel Maria

texts.es:
Ángel, tiene 29 años de edad, está casada  y su esposo tiene 35 años de edad, disfruta de dos hijos,  los cuales tienen edades  de 3 y 5 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas  y granos básicos, el oficio lo aprendió con su madre y lleva tres años de realizarlo.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar  maíz, quesillo, frijoles, harina de arroz, leña, entre otros; este le ayudara a incrementar sus inventarios y obtener más ingresos.
Su sueño es fortalecer más el negocio y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Ángel is 29 and married; her spouse is 35 years old.  She enjoys her children who are three and five years old.  She makes a living selling papusas (a traditional Salvadoran tortilla dish) and basic grains - the trade that she learned with her mother and in which she has spent three years working.

The loan that she requires will allow her to buy corn, small cheese, beans, rice flour, and firewood, among other things.  This will help her to increase her inventory and earn more income.

Her dream is to strengthen her business and provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, small cheese, beans, rice flour, and firewood, among other things.

loans.name: Emerthe

texts.en:
Emerthe is 33 years old, married, and has two children who attend school. Her husband works as a motorcyclist. She sells different types of drinks such as soft drinks and alcoholic beverages. 

Emerthe is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy more sodas and beers for sale in her pub.  The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to purchase beer, soda, and mineral water.

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima is married and has three children. Her husband is a businessman and she struggles to provide their children with everything that they need. Halima and her husband didn’t have basic necessities when they were growing up. They don’t want their children to have the same experience.

Halima sells coal from her home. This has worked out well for her. She has regular customers since she has been doing this job for a while.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy more coal. She sells this item and wants to have a sufficient supply. She is thankful for the opportunity that she and her family will receive.

loans.use: to buy more coal to sell.

loans.name: Eleuterio

texts.es: El Sr. Eleuterio tiene 29 años,  el se dedica a la agricultura sembrando variedad de vegetales como también papa y yuca y maíz en su parcela que se encuentra en la comunidad de nuevo Surutu,  este préstamo es el su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  el Sr. Eleuterio va a utilizar  este préstamo para la compra de semillas para siembra de arroz  y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para obtener recursos  para la siembra y poder subsistir, el Sr. Eleuterio enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las inclemencias del clima que en muchas ocasiones arruinan los sembradíos,  y utilizara los beneficios para mejorara la calidad de vida del cliente y de su familia ya que el corre con todos los gastos del hogar, es una persona  responsable y trabajador se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindad, una vez que cosecha sus productos los comercializa en el mercado de la comunidad directamente del productor al consumidor.
texts.en: Mr. Eleuterio is 29 years old and he works in agriculture planting various vegetables, as well as potatoes, yucca, and corn on his parcel of land that is in the community of Surutu. This loan is his first in a sequence with this institution. Mr. Eleuterio will use this loan to purchase seeds to plant rice, which means the land needs to be prepared. His reason for asking for this loan is to obtain the resources for planting his crop and to be able to live. Mr. Eleuterio has faced challenges in his business such as inclement weather, which on many occasions has ruined the harvest. He will use the the benefits from the loan to improve the quality of life of his clientele as well as his family, because he is in charge of all the household expenses. He is a responsible and hard working person who feels grateful for the support the institution has given him, once he harvests his crops he will sell them in a market in his community, directly from producer to consumer.

loans.use: purchase seeds to plant rice.

loans.name: Ziad

texts.en: Ziad is a 29-year-old married man who has two children. They live together in Ibb, Yemen. He has great aspirations to make a wedding materials shop. He already has a number of regular customers that takes his products (dresses) for rent during few days then get back to him which provides a good income. Therefore, he is planning to expand the business. His most important dream is to continue forward with a stable business. For this reason, he would like a youth loan of 300,000 Yemeni Rials (YER) from AMB to buy ladies' dresses to rent them to his customers. In the future, he hopes to increase the size of his shop in order to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to buy ladies' dresses to rent them to his customers.

loans.name: Neftali

texts.es:
Neftalí, es un agricultor, vive con su familia, cuenta con su propia vivienda, realiza su trabajo con el apoyo de su suegro, esto lo aprendió desde pequeño y ha ganado mucha experiencia. El requiere de un prestamo para trabajar en el cultivo de granos básicos; este le permitirá comprar los insumos agricolas necesarios tales  como: abono, herbicidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas, pesticidas.
La aspiración de él, es sacar adelante a su familia a través del trabajo constante, poderle ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Neftalí is a farmer.  He lives with family and has his own home.  He does his job with the help of his father-in-law.  He learned it from a young age and has gained a lot of experience.

He needs a loan to buy the necessary agricultural inputs to grow basic grains: soil amendments, herbicide, pesticide, and insecticide.

His goal is to get his family ahead through constant work and be able to give them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soil amendments, herbicide, insecticide, and pesticide

loans.name: Mwashamba

texts.en: Mwashamba has a retail shop, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. In addition, she has a charcoal sales business. Her major challenge in the business is the high cost of transportation. With the loan she is requesting she wants to purchase 6 bags of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business, and she appreciates the previous Kiva loan.

loans.use: To buy 6 bags of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Margarit

texts.en:
Margarit is 45 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in the village of Nor Geghi, which is in Kapan area. Her daughter is married and lives with her family.  Since 1992 Margarit and her family have engaged in the agricultural business. They have plot of land near their house and grow vegetables, such as potatoes, tomatoes, and cucumbers. Margarit’s husband sells their crops in fruit markets. She also has a big barn for animals where she breeds piglets. 

Margarit is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy a fodder, oats, and cereals for her piglets. She and her family work hard day and night in order to sustain their family. She hopes to receive more profit from her farming in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fodder, oats, and cereals for her piglets

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael, 49, is a farmer with eleven children from the farming area of Chibombo District, Zambia. He is asking for a Kiva loan to buy a water pump so that he can irrigate his farm.

Michael is an experienced farmer, growing watermelon, green maize, tomatoes, and onions for income. After a successful season supplying watermelon to a major market in Lusaka (the capital city), he has realized the need for a water pump to further expand his farm.

Equipment such as a water pump can be a major boost for many farmers such as Michael, as it allows for increased production and more predictable yields due to irrigation. Unfortunately, the upfront cost of such a water pump can be prohibitive, even for an ambitious and accomplished farmer such as Michael. Once Michael secures a loan, he will be able to get a water pump from Rent-to-Own, which will deliver the equipment to his farm, as well as provide training on how to use and maintain it.

With a water pump, Michael will be able to irrigate a larger portion of land in less time, increasing the quantity of fresh produce that he can grow. Michael added that he hopes to be able to grow his farm to one day have a water tank and sprinkler system, while being able to employ people from his community.

It is for this reason Michael is asking Kiva lenders to help him secure a water pump as soon as possible.

loans.use: to pay for a water pump that will be used to irrigate his farm

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan de 59 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años su principal siembra es el maíz,  con las ventas que realiza de sus cosechas logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es un hombre responsable, honesto y trabajador vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos. Juan  está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos para su cosecha como: fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, herbicidas, etc. ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir esos gastos y así tener mejores ingresos y tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
59-year-old Juan has made a living in agriculture for 20 years; his main plant is corn.  With the sales he makes from his harvests he manages to cover the expenses of his home.  He is a responsible, honest, and hard-working man who lives with his wife and two children.  

Juan is asking for a loan to be able to buy supplies for his harvest, like fertilizers, manure, seeds, weedkiller, etc., because what he earns is not enough to cover these costs and this way he will have better income and better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure, seeds, weedkiller, etc.

loans.name: Zaiya

texts.en: Zaiya is a 30-year-old female Babban Gona member, residing in Pampaida-Makaranta. Zaiya has high hopes for the profits she can make on her 0.7 hectare farm this season. She hopes to build off her success with Babban Gona from last year; with the profit she was able to make last year, Zaiya remarks that “[her] life is good because of Babban Gona.” Being a member of Babban Gona has allowed Zaiya to think positively about not only her future but that of her children. This year, a Babban Gona loan in the form of improved seeds, high quality fertilizers, and other critical inputs and services will give Zaiya the opportunity to triple her yield and income. Her personal aim is to be able to afford to build a better house for her and her family as well as satisfy her life-long desire to go on a religious pilgrimage. For her three children, Mansura, Sani, and Salamatu, she hopes that she will be able to afford to send them to university with the money she makes through Babban Gona.

loans.use: To access agricultural inputs and technologies that increase maize yields and iltimately profitability

loans.name: Jessenia

texts.es:
Jessenia, de 24 años de edad, esta casada con Bill quien es empleado y padre de su único hijo. Juntos viven cómodamente en la casa de su cuñada.La actividad que realiza Jessenia es la venta de bebidas gasificadas de varios sabores y diferentes marcas , está venta la realiza desde  su casa en donde tiene una refrigeradora para guardar las bebidas que compra.Se inició hace más de 01 año contando con un capital propio, comprando y vendiendo en pequeñas cantidades, luego fue aumentando sus compras de acuerdo a los clientes que iba adquiriendo.Este será el préstamo número 06 con Kiva y se siente agradecida por contar con un apoyo financiero que le permite incrementar sus ingresos económicos , además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Con el monto solicitado de 600 soles comprará bebidas gasificadas al por mayor.
texts.en:
Jessenia, 24, is married to Bill, who works and is the father of her only child.  They live together comfortably in her sister-in-law's house.

Jessenia's job is selling carbonated beverages in a variety of flavors and brands.  She does this work from home, where she has a refrigerator to keep the beverages she buys.  She started more than a year ago with her own capital, buying and selling in small quantities.  Then she kept on increasing her sales in accordance with the customers she was acquiring.

This will be her sixth Kiva loan.  She's grateful to have some financial help to increase her income and promises to make her payments punctually.

With the requested amount of 600 soles [PEN] she'll buy carbonated beverages wholesale.

loans.use: to buy carbonated beverages wholesale

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 50 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, además es amable y sociable sabiendo ganarse el aprecio de las personas con su carisma. Está casada con Israel quien se dedica al transporte y es padre de sus 03 hijos.La actividad que realiza María es la costura, oficio que aprendió estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional , también vende pescados por las mañanas en el mercadillo de su barrio.La costura las realiza desde su casa, a donde llegan sus clientes y los atiende amablemente.Este será el préstamo número 06 con Kiva y por tanto espera de su apoyo financiero para seguir adelante con su negocio.Con el monto solicitado de  2000 nuevos soles comprará materiales de costura como telas, hilos, elásticos y otros .
texts.en: María, age 50, is a hard-working and persevering woman who has a great desire to get ahead. She is also kind and friendly, and is able to gain esteem through her charisma. She is married to Israel, who works in transportation and is the father of her three children. María is a seamstress, a job that she learned through studying at a trade school. She also sells fish in the mornings in her neighbourhood market. She sews at home, which is where her clients go. She provides kind service. This will be her sixth loan on Kiva, so she hopes for your support in moving forward with this business. With the requested 2000 nuevos soles, she will buy sewing materials such as fabric, thread, and elastics.

loans.use: to buy sewing materials like fabric, thread, and buttons.

loans.name: Juan Santos

texts.es:
Juan, solicita un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de mas capital de trabajo para invertir en el cultivo de granos básicos; este le permitirá comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios tales como: abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, plaguicidas, pesticidas, entre otros.
El crédito anterior fue de mucha ayuda, ya que le sirvió para incrementar la productividad y las ganancias las invierte en los gastos básicos del hogar; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
Juan is requesting a new loan because he needs more working capital to invest in the cultivation of basic grains. This will allow him to buy the necessary agricultural supplies such as: fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides, fungicides, and pesticides.
His previous loan was very helpful, since it allowed him to increase his productivity. He invests his income in basic household costs; his family's circumstances and economic conditions have improved.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides, pesticides, and other items.

loans.name: Safiya

texts.en: Safiya is a 42-year-old mother of six residing in Pampaida-Makaranta. Not only is she a Babban Gona farmer, she is also a Babban Gona Trust Group Leader. Safiya leads a group of Babban Gona female farmers and as a leader, she provides her group with the necessary guidance and leadership to increase their productivity and profitability.  For Safiya, Babban Gona is an integral component of her family’s livelihood; even her husband, Haruna, is a Babban Gona Member. Safiya is thrilled with how her family has benefited from Babban Gona; she says “Babban Gona is a good business and it has made my life better.” Safiya is most excited about the fact that through Babban Gona she receives multiple profit payments as opposed to making only a meager profit at harvest under a traditional system. She now has high hopes and aspirations for her six children; her desire is that they attain a university education and go on to lead successful lives. With the improved seeds, high quality fertilizer, and other inputs that Safiya will receive this year on credit, she will stand the chance to triple her yield and income, bringing her closer to achieving her goals.

loans.use: To access high quality inputs and services that can triple yields and incomes

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick, 46, is a farmer with four children from the farming area of Chibombo District, Zambia. He is asking for a Kiva loan to buy a water pump so that he can irrigate his farm.

Patrick has been supplying markets in Zambia’s Copperbelt region for the past fifteen years. An experienced farmer, he he produces tomatoes, watermelons, cucumbers, and butternut squash. While his business is growing at a fast rate, his farm currently relies on hiring an engine pump from a neighbor. If the pump is not available, Patrick must irrigate by hand and his yields can suffer.

Equipment such as a water pump can be a major boost for many vegetable farmers such as Patrick, as it allows for increased production and more predictable yields due to irrigation. Unfortunately, the upfront costs of such a water pump can be very prohibitive, even for successful and experienced farmers like Patrick. Once he secures a loan, Patrick will be able to get a water pump from Rent-to-Own, which will deliver the equipment to his farm, as well as provide training on how to use and maintain it.

With a pump, Patrick can irrigate a larger portion of land in less time and not have to wait to hire a pump from his neighbour. He will be able to increase his yields, and be able to sell more of his crops to the lucrative markets in the Copperbelt region.

It is for this reason Patrick is asking Kiva lenders to help him with the loan so that he can secure a water pump as soon as possible.

loans.use: to pay for a water pump that will be used for irrigation.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis, 44, is a farmer with four children from the farming area of Chibombo District, Zambia. He is asking for a Kiva loan to buy a water pump so that he can irrigate his vegetable farm.

Francis has been farming vegetables for local and regional markets for more than five years. Currently he produces fresh maize, greens, peppers, and a local eggplant called ‘Impwa.’ While demand for his produce is high, he is unable to produce more due to the lack of a water pump for irrigation. To water his crops, Francis must hire a pump from a friend in the community.
 
Equipment such as a water pump can be a major boost for many vegetable farmers such as Francis, as it allows for increased production and more predictable yields due to irrigation. Unfortunately, the upfront costs of a pump can be very prohibitive, and local retailers do not provide training on how to maintain or use water pumps. Once Francis secures a loan, he will be able to obtain a water pump from Rent-to-Own, which will deliver the equipment to his farm, as well as provide training on how to use and maintain it.

With his own water pump, whether in the rainy season or dry season, Francis will be able to grow and sell his produce throughout the year. The use of a pump will also mean that he can irrigate a larger portion of land in less time and not be restricted by the costs of having to hire a pump from elsewhere.
 
Francis added that as he starts producing more vegetables, he will be able to extend his business to serve markets in Lusaka, the capital.
 
It is for this reason Francis is asking Kiva lenders to help him with the loan so that he can secure a water pump as soon as possible.

loans.use: to pay for a water pump kit to be used for irrigation

loans.name: Eber Enrique

texts.es: Eber de 31 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus dos hijo de 6 y 2 años de edad. El posee una venta de cuadros elaborados por el mismo, es muy conocido en la zona pues su trabajo es muy artístico, bonito, de excelente calidad y sobre todo a muy buen precio, se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente y no quiere decepcionarlos, quiere abastecer mas su negocio con las pinturas que realiza. Eber es un hombre de visión a futuro su mayor pasatiempo es trabajar. El sabe que tiene un don  y quiere aprovecharlo es  por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar madera, tela, pintura, y barniz. Eber tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Eber, age 31, lives with his wife and two children ages 2 and 6. He sells his own paintings and is very well-known in the area because his work is very beautiful, artistic, and of excellent quality. It is also offered at a very good price. He has build up a good clientele lately and he does not want to disappoint them, so he wants to stock his business with more paintings. 
Eber is a man with a vision for the future. His favourite pastime is working. He knows that he has a gift and wants to use it. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from Integral which will allow him to buy wood, fabric, paint, and varnish. Eber hopes that this work will allow him to offer his home economic stability and provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy wood, fabric, paint, and varnish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chickens, vitamins, and chicken feed.

loans.name: Juan Gabriel

texts.es: Son Juan de 33 años de edad se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace 10 años vende sus productos en agencias de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, don Juan esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, herbicidas, etc. y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Don Juan, age 33, has been growing corn and beans for 10 years. He sells his products to the dry goods wholesalers that are near his place of residence. The profits he generates from his sales are used to cover his household expenses. He lives in his own home with his wife and two children.

Don Juan is requesting a loan so that he can buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, herbicides, and other supplies. As a result, he will be able to provide better financial stability for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, herbicides, and other supplies.

loans.name: Husan

texts.ru: Хусан житель района Дж.Руми, расположенного в южной части страны. Ему 31 год. Он женат и является отцом троих детей. Хусан занимается земледелием. Одновременно он хочет начать животноводческую деятельность, чтобы улучшить условия проживания. Хусан планирует заняться купле-продажей мелкого рогатого скота. Он будет закупать каждый месяц по трех голов овец, откармливать их в течение месяца и затем продавать с наценкой на скотном рынке. Хусан при дворе дома имеет сарай для содержания скота. Он просит кредит для закупа трех голов овец и их корма. За счет прибыли с продажи Хусан хочет провести торжество по случаю обрезания сына.
texts.en:
Husan is a resident of the J. Rumy region, situated in the southern part of the country. He is 31 years old. He is married and is the father of three children. 

Husan works with agriculture. At the same time he would like to start a livestock business, in order to improve living conditions. Husan plans to work with buying and reselling of sheep and goats. He will purchase around three sheep every month, fatten them for a period of a month, and then resell them with a margin at the livestock market. Husan has a barn for livestock in his courtyard. 

Husan requests a loan for the purchase of three sheep and fodder for them. With the income from the loan, he would like to hold a celebration of his son's circumcision.

loans.use: to purchase three sheep and fodder for them

loans.name: Martin

texts.es: El Sr. Martin  sigue con la misma actividad de la agricultura, plantando papa, yuca y variedad de hortalizas, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de semillas, en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas para la siembra de papa y también para el preparado de la tierra ya que esta época tiene mucha demanda de este producto.
texts.en: Sr. Martin is continuing with the same business (agriculture), sowing potato, yucca, and a variety of vegetables. He says that his previous loan went well and that he used it to purchase seeds. He is now requesting a loan for the purchase of seeds for sowing potato and to prepare the land; in this season there is a great demand for this product.

loans.use: to prepare the land and sow potato.

loans.name: Bahtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиер порядочный и ответственный мужчина в возрасте 42 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Бахтиёр со своей семьёй живёт в маленькой деревне. С юнных лет он помогал своему отцу пасти скот и таким образом многому научился. Сейчас Бахтиер сам занимается деканством и животноводством. Этот бизнес ему приносит хороший доход. Жена помогает Бахтиёру в этом деле, она помогает ухаживать за скотом, разводить их. А потом она продаёт молоко, которое дают коровы. Каждый день коровы дают по 10 литров молока, что приносит хороший ежедневный доход. Также у Бахтиёра есть дополнительный доход. Он подрабатывает мастером в местной мастерской. На данный момент у Бахтиёра есть в наличии несколько голов скота, но он хочет расширить свой бизнес, увеличив поголовье скота. Для этого он хочет взять кредит в Арванд, чтобы купить скот. Бахтиёр надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en: Bahtiyor is a decent and responsible 42 year old man. He is married and has three children. Bahtiyor lives with his family in a small village. Since childhood he has been helping his father to raise cattle and knows a lot about livestock. Now Bahtiyor has a small farm and continues to raise livestock as well. His farm brings him a good profit. Bahtiyor's wife helps her husband, she takes care of the animals and breeds them. She also sells the milk from her cows. Every day her cows produce 10 liters of milk which results in a great daily profit. In addition, Bahtiyor also works in the local workshop. Currently, the family owns several cows, but Bahtiyor wants to expand the herd and earn even more money for his family. For this reason he would like to take out a loan from Arvand. Bahtiyor is hoping for a positive outcome on his loan and thanks everyone in advance.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Bobojon

texts.ru: Бобочон живет и работает в городе Кургантюбе, в южной части Таджикистана. Ему 29 лет. Он женат и живет со своей женой в родительском доме. У него среднее образование. Бобочон в последние 3 года работал в колбасном цехе. Сейчас он намерен заняться торговым бизнесом, что позволит ему увеличить семейный доход. На рынке города он уже приобрел торговую точку. Бобочон планирует заняться продажей женской одежды.  В бизнесе ему будут помогать жена и брат. Бобочон обратился за кредитом, чтобы закупить товар. В будущем он хочет стать большим бизнесменом.
texts.en: Bobojon lives and works in Qurgan-Tube in southern Tajikistan. He is 29 years old, married and lives with his wife in his parent's house. He has a high school degree. For the last three years Bobojon has been working in a sausage factory. Now he wants to open a retail stall so that he can increase his family's profits. He already purchased a market stall at the city's marketplace. Bobojon plans to sell women's clothes and his wife and brother are planning to help him manage the stall and the inventory. Bobojon is requesting this loan to purchase clothing in bulk for resale. In the future he hopes to become a great businessman.

loans.use: to purchase women's clothing for resale

loans.name: Vilma Epifania

texts.es: Doña Vilma de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus 2 dos hijos. Ella posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia donde confecciona diferentes tipos de prendas, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque el trabajo que ella realiza es excelente y los elabora a precios realmente accesibles; ella es una mujer muy dedicado a su trabajo responsable y honesta, Vilma esta solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar: telas, hilos, agujas, y todo lo relacionado con la costura para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad de los clientes y así ella y su familia podrán tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Vilma, 50, lives in her own house with her life companion and their two children.  She has a sewing shop at home where she makes different types of clothes.  Lately she’s acquired many customers because the work she does is excellent and she makes them for really affordable prices.  She’s a responsible, honest woman who is very devoted to her work.

Vilma’s asking for this loan to be able to buy fabric, thread, needles and everything related to sewing so she can continue meeting customer demand so she and her family can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Savri

texts.ru: Саври 46 лет. Она трудолюбивая женщина. Саври разведенная женщина, и имеет 2 детей. Детям 17 и 19 лет. Она трудится день и ночь, чтобы обеспечить своих детей хорошим условием проживания. Она сама не смогла получить высшее образование, так как она выросла в малообеспеченной семье и ее родители не имели денег для того, чтобы Саври поступила в университет. Саври всегда мечтала, чтобы ее дети получили высшее образование. Данное время ее дочь студентка. Она учится хорошо и отлично. Саври не имеет денег для оплаты учебы дочери, так как она работает техперсоналом в таксопарке. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 сомони для оплаты учебы дочери. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Savri is 46 years old. She is a hardworking woman. Savri is a divorced woman, and she has two children. The children are 17 and 19 years old. She works day and night in order to provide her children with good living conditions. 

Savri was not able to receive higher education herself, as she grew up in a low-income family and her parents did not have money for her to go to the university. She always dreamed that her children would receive higher education. Currently her daughter is a student. She studies well. 

Savri does not have money to pay for her daughter's tuition, as she works as cleaning staff at a taxi company. She requests a loan in the amount of 500 somoni to pay for her daughter's tuition. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for her daughter’s education

loans.name: Mwanaidi

texts.en:
Mwanaidi is married and blessed with three children who attend school. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

She cooks food for sale at the market and sells it to town dwellers and passersby. She says that leftover food leads to losses; hence, it is her major challenge in business. She dreams of establishing a café business in the future.

With the 40,000 KES she wants to purchase food ingredients such as beans, rice, wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and cooking oil. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to expand her business

loans.use: to purchase food ingredients such as beans, rice, wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and cooking oil.

loans.name: Turdimurod

texts.ru: Турдимурод жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 50 лет. Он женат и имеет одного единственного ребёнка. Со своей женой они мечтали иметь много детишек, но в связи со здоровьем у них родился один долгожданный и любимый сын. Всю свою жизнь они посвящают ему и делают всё возможное для обеспечения своего сына. Они живут бедно, но радость никогда не покидает их дом. Все соседи ценят их доброе сердце. Сам Турдимурод вот уже более 20 лет занимается дехканством, он опытный дехканин. Он имеет свою площадь, где выращивает разного вида зерновую культуру. Это его основной бизнес, от которого он получает хороший доход. Также он имеет несколько голов рогатого скота, за которыми они ухаживают для дальнейшей продажи. В этом деле ему помогает его жена, она ухаживает за скотом, а также продаёт молоко, полученное от этого скота. От выращивания зерновых культур каждый год Турдимурод получает стабильный хороший доход, поэтому он хочет увеличить объём урожая  и получить больше дохода от этого. В связи с этим Турдимурод обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит для покупки разнообразных семян зерновой культуры. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Turdimurod is a cheerful man of 50. He is married and has only one child. He and his wife always dreamed to have many children, but due to their health they only managed to have one, their long-awaited and beloved son. The two have dedicated their life to him and are doing everything they can to provide for him. They live modestly but happiness never leaves their house. All their neighbors appreciate this family's generous soul. Turdimurod himself is an experienced farmer and has been farming for 20 years. He has his own land where he grows grain. This is his main source of income and he makes good profits from his farm. Turdimurod also has cattle which he raises for resale. His wife helps take care of the animals and she also sells their milk. The grain harvest is the main stable income for the family so Turdimurod wants to increase his harvest and be able to earn more from it. For this reason Turdimurod has turned to Arvand for a loan which he will use to buy seeds for various grain crops. He thanks everyone in Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy seeds

loans.name: Othman

texts.en: Othman is a 45 years old married man and he is the father of four sons. Othman is a government employee during the day. Afterward he goes to work in his mini-market to sell basic food products and serve the neighborhood. He is applying for a loan to add more types of food products and add a few types of detergent to his stock.

loans.use: to add more types of food products and also add several types of detergent

loans.name: Maria Paula

texts.es:
María,  tiene 49 años de edad, está casado y su esposa tiene 52 años de edad, disfruta de un hijo, el cual está estudiando y tiene 18 años. Ella se dedica a la agricultura y posee una tienda en casa, este oficio lo realiza desde hace mucho tiempo  atrás. 
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar articulos para la tienda tales como: azucar, arroz, frijoles, sodas, jugos, pan, golosinas, entre otros; asimismo abono, herbicidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas, pesticidas, semilla y para la preparación de la tierra; este le ayudara a obtener mejores ingresos e incrementar su inventario.
Su sueño es fortalecer más el negocio y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida  a su familia.
texts.en:
María, 49, is married and her husband is 51-years-old.  She enjoys her son who is 18 and attending school.  She works in agriculture and has a grocery store at home; she’s been doing this work for quite some time.

The loan she needs will make it possible for her to buy items like sugar, rice, beans, sodas, juice, bread and snacks, among others for her store as well as manure, herbicide, fungicide, insecticide, pesticide and seeds and to prepare the soil.  This will help her to earn higher income and to increase her inventory.  Her dream is to strengthen the business more and to provide better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store and to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Rosa Ofelia

texts.es: Doña Rosa de 43 años de edad vive junto a su hija en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene 2 años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las venta, está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda mas surtida, las personas la prefieren y la mantienen delante de la competencia porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes, ; Rosa es una mujer dedicada a su labor, enérgica y con muchas metas por delante, como toda buena comerciante  quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, huevos, pan, bebidas, etc. Rosa tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa, 43, lives in her own house with her daughter.  She has a store where she sells basic staples like beans, milk, eggs and bread, among others.  She’s had the business for two years and has gained sales experience.  It’s located at home which is in a very busy area so she has many customers because she keeps the store well-stocked.  People prefer her and keep her ahead of the competition because she always has what they need: quality products at affordable prices with unequaled customer service.

Rosa is an energetic woman who is dedicated to her work; she has many future goals.  Like all good merchants she wants to increase business and make a new investment but needs capital to do so which is why she’s asking Integral for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy basic grains, snacks, eggs, bread, beverages, etc.  Rosa has good payment references and is sure to repay the loan while at the same time she’s confident that she’ll be able to give her family better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Don Luís de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, su  hija, su nieto y el yerno, él se dedica a la venta de cocos en un pick-up vende en todas las colonias que están cerca de su lugar de residencia ya tiene mucha clientela pues vende sus productos a un buen precio, con las ventas que realiza logra obtener buenas ganancias que le sirven para cubrir los gastos de su hogar y otras necesidades que se le puedan presentar, Don Luís solicita un crédito para poder comprar los cocos por mayor ya que últimamente ha tenido mucha demanda y obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia un mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: 51-year-old age Don Luís lives at his own home with his wife, daughter, grandson and the son-in-law. He devotes himself to the sale of coconuts in a pickup, selling to all of the areas that are close to his residence. He already has many clients since he sells products at a good price. With the sales that he completes, he manages to obtain a good profit that serves to him to cover the expenses of his home and other needs that might present themselves. Don Luís requests a loan to be able to buy wholesale coconuts, since lately there has been a great demand, and to obtain better profits to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale coconuts

loans.name: Jean De Dieu

texts.en: Jean De Dieu is 25 years old. He is single and has a goal of accomplishing more in his business of selling used batteries. He has spent four years in the business. He has courage and is motivated by getting a loan to buy more batteries to sell. He plans to use the profits from the business to increase his  savings in the hopes of improving the future of the business.

loans.use: To buy more batteries to sell.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en: Roselyn is a 43-year-old married woman living in Punta, Panaon, Philippines. She has 2 children who have assisted her sometimes in the feeding and caring of the animals. The small piggery she is working on at this time was started 5 years ago. While not the only source of income, Roselyn earns a total of about PHP 25,000 a month. Recently, she has requested PHP 50,000 to purchase additional piglets to raise. She plans to buy more piglets and renovate the livestock shelter to gain more income and improve her family's living condition.

loans.use: to purchase additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Mejumaa

texts.en:
Mejumaa is 38 years old and is from Samburu, Mombasa, Kenya. She lives with her partner, Suleiman, who is an administrator. They live in their own home, and have three children. The children are school aged and are dependent on them.
 
Mejumaa has run a retail shop for over fifteen years, which is going very well. She says that she has a loyal customer base thanks to her excellent service. Additionally her shop is the best-stocked store in the neighborhood. This combination of factors means that she is enjoying lots of success.

She dreams of being able to continue to grow, so that she can earn enough to help her husband with the household expenses. She is requesting this loan to buy drinks, sugar, rice, flour and other items, as these are among the best-selling products. She is grateful for the help she is receiving, it will be very useful.

loans.use: to buy drinks, sugar, rice, flour and other items

loans.name: Mwari

texts.en:
Mwari is married and has been blessed with two children. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. She cites food and school fees for her children to be her major challenges.

She operates a fruit juice and fried potato business. She sells to her neighbors and town dwellers. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transportation from the market to her place of operation. 

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase sacks of fruits and potatoes to prepare for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fruits and potatoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new toys to replace broken ones and buy a few learning tools for the older kids.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to repair his house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente vive con su compañera de vida en casa de sus padres; el posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio esta ubicado en el lugar de su residencia, es muy reconocido por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, el quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar: granos basicos, huevos, aceite, espaguetis, refrescos, golosinas, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que tendrá una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This client lives with his life partner in his parents' house.  He owns a store where he sells basic household products such as beans, milk, eggs, bread, etc.  He has been in his business for a long time and his store is located in his home.  He is very well known by his neighbors and has gained a lot of customers as he keeps the store well stocked.  The client would like to increase his business and make a new investment but he needs capital in order to do this.  He is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy basic grains, eggs, oil, spaghetti, soft drinks, candies, etc.  He promises to repay his loan and believes that he will enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, eggs, oil, spaghetti, soft drinks, candies, etc.

loans.name: Santos Tomas

texts.es: Don Santos de 45 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y su hijo, el es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son: maíz y fríjol. Don Santos desea incrementar sus ventas por eso solicita un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Santos, 45, is a man who takes his home responsibilities seriously since he’s always been noted for providing the best for his family.  He currently lives with his wife and son.  He’s very hardworking and has always worked with joy and enthusiasm.  He works in agriculture and every year grows the local basic grains: corn and beans.  

Santos wants to increase sales which is why he’s asking for a loan to be able to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer and pesticide, among others.  She wants to have this support to rely on because she has no other source of income and this way she’ll be able to continue providing daily bread for her home with no limits whatsoever.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es: Don José de 56 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos en casa propia, el se dedica a vender huevos en un local que tiene en el mercado que está cerca de su residencia, desde hace 25 años con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar solventar los gastos de su hogar, tiene mucha clientela pues su producto es muy vendible y lo da  aun precio muy accesible, el quiere acrecentar su negocio comprando huevos al por mayor por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo antes mencionado y así obtener mejores ganancias y poderle dar a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: José, 56, lives with his wife and two children in his own house.  He has worked selling eggs in a stand he has in a market near his house for 25 years and with profits from sales he’s able to cover his household expenses.  He has many customers because his product sells well and he sells it at an affordable price.  He wants to expand the business buying eggs at wholesale and this is why he’s asking for a loan to buy the aforementioned thus obtaining higher profits and being able to provide his family with better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy eggs at wholesale.

loans.name: Angel

texts.es: Ángel  de treinta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos; el posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene varios años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las venta, está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda mas surtida, las personas lo prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes, como todo buen comerciante  quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, huevos, pan, bebidas, etc. confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Thirty-nine-year-old Angel lives with his female partner for life and his two sons; he has a shop where he sells basic products like beans, milk, eggs, bread, and more. He has several years of experience in his business and that has given him experience in sales. The store is located in the place of his residence and has gained a lot of clients because he has a well stocked shop. People prefer it because it always has what they need with quality products at affordable prices and with unparalleled service always at the customers' order. Like all good salesmen, he wants to increase business and make a new investment, but he need capital. For this reason his is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that allows him to buy basic grains, sweets, eggs, bread, beverages, etc. He is confident that it will give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy grains, sweets, eggs, bread, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert studies at Yerevan "Haybusak" University. He lives with his parents and sister, and together with them, works hard to sustain the family's living.

As the income that the family gets is hardly enough for covering daily costs, it is very difficult for Robert to save money for his university tuition. So, Robert has applied for this loan to pay for his university tuition and complete his education.

Robert dreams of becoming a dentist after graduation and having a job with enough salary to be financially independent. This loan is important for him to continue his education and make his dream come true.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Myagmarsuren

texts.en: Myagmarsuren, 43 years old, lives with her husband and daughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family is currently residing in Mongolian traditional ger(portable felt dwelling) due to house renovation process on a plot of land. Her husband has been rendering transportation service to local people by using his own truck. Her daughter works as a cashier at a private business entity. She herself has been working as a manager for five years and is considered by her fellow workers as a good manager. The house they live in has vulnerable walls through which heat is lost. So she is requesting a loan of 6,000,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials such as bricks, planks, cement, fiberglass and foam. Using these materials, she and her husband will repair and insulate their deteriorated house back to a high quality house. The renovated house will enable the family to burn less coal, emit less smoke and then contribute to the efforts against air pollution. The borrower is a very hardworking and caring individual who also wants to plant some trees outside her house as a boost for the environment.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine has been a customer of Yehu Microfinance since 2010. She lives in her own home in the town of Samburu and is married with 6 children. Catherine has a fruit and vegetable farm at home.
Catherine is a person who has a great desire to succeed. She has always worked and strives to give her family everything that they need for a better life.
She is asking for this loan to be able to buy seeds and insecticide as she needs them to invest in the harvest as they are fundamental ingredients.

loans.use: to buy seeds and insecticide.
