Simeon agradece a los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le estan brindando el podrá mejorar las paredes de su vivienda, ya que actualmente se encuentran rajadas y de esta  manera podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia, de esta manera el podrá seguir luchando para podrá hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Reunir a sus hijos que se encuentra lejos de la ciudad”.
texts.en:
Simeon is a very hard-working man.  At his 63 years of age he keeps the vitality and joy of a 20 year old young man.  Simeon lives in the city of Nazca, a warm city with marvelous tourist attractions.  Its people are happy and charismatic.  Simeon shares his life together with his wife, who supports him in everything that he does.  Above all, she is his friend and his best companion.

Each day Simeon works as a farmer.  He devotes around eight hours a day to his work.  He does this because it pays the household expenses.  Simeon believes that he is getting ahead because he is responsible, and above all, he likes what he does.

Simeon is grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the support they are giving him he will be able to improve the walls of his house.  They are currently cracked, and this way he will be able to have a better quality of life for his family.  This way he will be able to continue struggling in order to be able to make his biggest dream come true:  “To reunite his children who are far away from the city”.

loans.use: to improve the walls.

loans.name: Luz Mirian

texts.es:
Luz tiene 40 años de edad, y es madre cabeza de familia de tres hijos. Laboró por varios años en el sector de la confección, conocimientos y habilidades que trasladará a la creación de su propio negocio. Con el fin de iniciar con su proyecto productivo, Luz se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una máquina de coser y dedicarse a trabajar desde su hogar en la confección de prendas de vestir.
Sueña con tener una buena aceptación en el mercado local y generar los recursos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su familia.
texts.en:
Luz is 40 years old and is the female head of a family of three children. She has been working for some years in the garment sector, gaining knowledge and craftsmanship in order to create her own business.

With the purpose of beginning her own production project, Luz is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of a sewing machine so she can work from home making clothing to wear.

She dreams of having a good reception in the local market and earning enough to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Jose Alvaro

texts.es:
José, vive con su familia. El se dedica al cultivo de granos basicos como una fuente financiera para obtener ingresos, lo aprendio de su familia. El prestamo que solicita  le permitirá comprar los insumos agricolas necesarios para llevar a cabo el cultivo tales como: abono, herbicidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas, pesticidas, entre otros; este le ayudara a incrementar sus ingresos y lograr una buena cosecha.
Su sueño es obtener mayores utilidades y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Jose lives with his family. His source of income comes from growing basic grains, an activity he learned from his family.
This loan will allow him to buy farming supplies for his crops such as fertilizer, herbicide, fungicide, insecticide, pesticide, etc. This will help him increase his income and will allow him to have a good harvest.
His dream is to increase his profit and offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, herbicide, fungicide, insecticide, pesticide, etc.

loans.name: Jhan Carlos

texts.es:
Jhan es un joven de 21 años muy alegre y entusiasta, que vive en el distrito de Parcona, Ica, Perú. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos Jhan solo ´pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de agronomía.

Día a día Jhan trabaja como obrero en un fundo la ciudad, con lo cual apoya a sus padres con los gastos del hogar ya que ellos también trabaja en un fundo y sus ingresos son pocos, Jhan cree que está saliendo adelante porque es muy amable y sobre todo tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante. 

Jhan está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su gran apoyo el podrá comprar una cocina a gas ya en su vivienda solo cocinan a leña y de esta manera podrá apoyar a sus padres en mejorar su calidad de vida y evitar accidentes, así el seguirá trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Estudiar la carrera de Agronomía”.
texts.en:
Jhan is a young 21 year old who is very happy and enthusiastic.  He lives in the district of Parcona in Ica, Perú.  Due to his limited economic means, Jhan has only been able to study through the 5th grade, but he would have liked to go on to study agronomy.  

Day after day Jhan works as a manual laborer on a farm close to the city.  With this job he helps his parents with household expenses since they also work on a farm and their income is limited.  Jhan believes that he is doing well because he is very kind and above all because he has a great desire to get ahead.

Jhan is very thankful for the Kiva lenders since thanks to their great help he will be able to purchase a gas stove since in his home they only cook over firewood and in this way he will be able to help his parents improve their quality of life and avoid accidents.  Thus he will continue working and struggling in order to make his great dream a reality: "To study the field of Agronomy."

loans.use: To purchase a gas stove.

loans.name: Benoitte

texts.en:
Benoitte is seeking a top-up loan of RWF 30,000  to purchase 10 additional rechargeable LED lights, which she will resell to people without electricity in her village. Every week or so, these customers will return to her to have their lights recharged for just RWF 100. 

Benoitte started selling lights in February, 2012 and she has sold 50 lights to date, providing clean energy to 250 people. She is also a shopkeeper and will reinvest the money she makes into expanding her other business to earn more money for herself and her husband.

loans.use: To buy 10 low-cost LED lights to resell to rural households without electricity.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.en:
Gabriel is a 31 year old man from Kayonza District in the Eastern Province of Rwanda. 

He is seeking a loan of  RWF 30,000 to purchase 10 rechargeable LED lights, which he will resell to people without electricity in his village. Every week or so, these customers will return to him to have their lights recharged for just RWF 100. 

Gabriel started selling lights in September, 2012 and he has sold 20 lights to date, providing clean energy to 100 people. He is also a shopkeeper and will reinvest the money he makes into expanding his other business to earn more money for himself and his wife .

loans.use: To buy 10 low-cost LED lights to resell to rural households without electricity.

loans.name: Mwanaisha

texts.en:
Mwanaisha is a hardworking person. This is her second loan with Kiva. She used the previous loan to purchase a fridge for her fruit juice business, and this enabled her to serve her customers and also fill orders that she had. She says that she wants to continue working because this is the only way she can help her family and provide them with what they need to continue growing. 

She is requesting this loan to purchase bales of hand bags and shoes to boost her business, which will enable her to improve her stock of products and continue meeting customer demand. She is grateful for this new assistance that she is receiving.

loans.use: to purchase bales of hand bags and shoes to boost her business.

loans.name: Kaed

texts.en:
Kaed is a married Iraqi client, who is 33 years old and has two children.

Kaed is a mechanic. He specializes in changing engine filters and fixing electrical problems of a car. Kaed established his business in 2006 and has gained his experience through previously working a several garages as an employee until he established his own business. Kaed now has an employee hired and has been growing with fame and respect thanks to his competitive prices.

Kaed is requesting a loan of 2,700 USD. He will use this loan to install a rolling shutter and a sunshade for his garage. Kaed is aiming to keep growing in his business so that he may provide his family with better living standards.

loans.use: to install a rolling shutter and a sunshade for his garage.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a fridge for resale

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Please meet 44-year-old Annie from Buchanan.  Buchanan is the capital city of Grand Bassa County and is located by the sea.  It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish.  Many logging companies are also based in the city.  Residents of the city love eating fufu, a cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce.  Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia.
 
Annie did not go to school. She is married and describes herself as a hard working woman. Her spouse works as a security man.  They have four children between 19 and 4 years old but only two are in school and live at home. 

Annie has a shop where she sells soap, hair oil, and clothes (blouses, T-shirts, jeans).  She has been in business for 12 years and works from Monday to Saturday, spending 9 hours per day.  With this loan, she will buy inventory.  One of the greatest challenges that she faces is low income.  She transports her goods by shared taxi.  She started her business with money from her husband.  She is proud of her business because of the profit she makes. Her future plan is to build a house.  She thanks you in advance for your support!

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Sardar

texts.en:
Sardar is 53 years old, married, and has four children, three sons and a daughter. His daughter goes to school. His sons go to university. He wants his sons to become businessmen. Sardar's wife stays at home, so he is the only one making an income. 

Sardar is an IDP (internally displaced person) from Kalbadjar. Now, he lives in Absheron region with his family. He started his business 20 years ago to make doors, windows, and the like, from wood and metal. 

Now Sardar needs an AZN 2,000 loan to buy needed equipment for his business. He wants to use the money from his expanded business to help his family. 

In the future, Sardar wants to repair and increase his workshop. This will make his business more profitable. Sardar is thankful to Komak Credit Union and Kiva for supporting him again. It is Sardar's third loan with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy needed equipment to make doors and windows.

loans.name: Leidy Johana

texts.es:
Leidy de 23 años de edad, es madre de tres hijos, a los cuales ama con todo su corazón. Asegura que son la luz de sus ojos y la razón de su existencia. Desde hace 5 meses, una amiga le brindó la oportunidad de tener su propio negocio, a lo cual ella no dudó ni un instante. Con sus ahorros compró el almacén y comenzó a laborar en la venta de artículos y accesorios tecnológicos (celulares, carcasas, minutos). Se siente muy satisfecha por los logros alcanzados y desea aumentar las ventas, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido.  
Sueña con garantizarles a sus tres hijos educación de calidad y mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Leidy is 23 years old and she is the mother of three children, who she loves very much. She tells us that they are the light of her eyes and the reason for her living. Five months ago, a friend offered her the opportunity to have her own business, something she didn't doubt for an instant. With her savings, she purchased a storefront and began to work selling technology items and accessories like cell phones, cases, and minutes. She is satisfied for all she has achieved and she wants to increase sales, and so, she is asking for a credit to invest in purchasing more stock. Her dream is to guarantee her three children a quality education and better living conditions.

loans.use: purchase technology items and accessories like cell phone, cases and batteries.

loans.name: Sergio De Jesús

texts.es: Sergio de 41 años de edad, es una de las víctimas del conflicto armado en el país. Al ser desplazado por los grupos al margen de la ley, tuvo que abandonar su tierra y cargar con el peso de una guerra en la que era inocente. Después de años de sufrimiento y desolación, logró regresar a su tierra e iniciar de nuevo a reconstruir su futuro. Fue así como creó una tienda agropecuaria en el municipio de San Carlos, Colombia, la cual hoy administra y le genera los ingresos para sostener a su familia. Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una estantería para adecuar su local y ofrecer una mejor calidad en el servicio. Sueña con tener una estabilidad económica y garantizarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Sergio, age 41, is one of the victims of armed conflict in his country.  Upon being displaced by groups on the margin of the law, he had to abandon his home and carry the weight of a war in which he was innocent.

After years of suffering and desolation, he managed to return to his home to begin again rebuilding his future.  That was how he established an agricultural store in the San Carlos municipality in Colombia.  He now runs the store, and it generates income for him to support his family.

He is now requesting a loan to buy shelving to remodel his place and offer a better quality of service.  He dreams of having financial security and assuring his family of better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy shelving.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Alonso de 28 años de edad, se caracteriza por se un hombre que tiene claro su metas y que no se deja afectar por la mediocridad y la envidia. Asegura que su trabajo le ha brindado la oportunidad de aprender del mundo de los negocios y adquirir experiencia. En la actualidad cuenta con una salsamentaria dedicada a  la venta de bebidas, licor y mecatos.
Con el fin de realizar adecuaciones locativas a su negocio y mejorar su presentación, Alonso se encuentra solicitando un crédito ya que no cuenta con los recursos para realizar dicha inversión.
Su mayor sueño es permanecer y crecer dentro de este nicho de mercado, mejorando la calidad de vida y garantizándoles a sus dos hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad una buena educación.
texts.en:
Alonso is 28 years old and is known for being a man clear about his goals, who does not let himself be troubled by mediocrity and jealousy.He says that his work has provided him the opportunity to learn about the world of business and to acquire experience. 

Currently he has a deli that sells drinks, liquor and snacks. With the aim of carrying out site improvements to his business and bettering its appearance, Alonso is requesting a loan, as he doesn't have the resources to undertake this investment. 

His greatest dream is to stay in business and grow within this market niche, improving his quality of life and making sure his two children, ages 7 and 2, receive a good education.

loans.use: To carry out on-site improvements.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan tiene 41 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Nazca al lado de su esposa y es padre de 3 hijos, a los cuales quiere muchísimo y por quienes a pesar de las adversidades se sacrifica y lucha para darles una vida digna. Juan es un hombre trabajador, anteriormente se dedicaba a trabaja en las minas pero debido a que uno de sus hijos desapareció hace 3 años ya no pudo seguir con el negocio, pero empezó a trabajar como chofer pero en ocasiones también trabaja como ayudante de albañil y con ello pudo seguir solventando los gastos de su familia; Juan trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y cree que está saliendo adelante porque es muy responsable.

Juan está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le están brindando podrá viajar a otra ciudad del país y por fin reunirse con su hija desaparecida, ya que luego de buscarla de manera incansable, por fin pudo dar con su paradero, de esta manera Juan podrá darle tranquilidad a su familia y poder trabajar más tranquilo y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle educación a sus hijos y poder tener una empresa de transportes”.
texts.en:
Juan is 41 years old. He lives in the city of Nazca with his wife. He is the father of 3 children, whom he loves very much, and for whom he sacrifices and fights in order to give them a dignified life despite the adversity. Juan is a hard-working man. Previously, he worked in the mines, but since one of his children disappeared 3 years ago, he could not continue with the business. He started to work as a chauffeur, but sometimes he also works as an assistant bricklayer, and with that he was able to continue covering his family's costs. Juan works about 9 hours a day, and he believes that he is moving ahead because he is very responsible.

Juan is grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help they are giving him he will be able to travel to another city in Peru and finally reunite with his daughter who disappeared, because after looking for her untiringly he was finally able to find out where she was. In this way Juan will give his family peace, and he will be able to work more calmly and continue fighting in order to make his biggest dream a reality: to give his children an education and to be able to have a transportation business.

loans.use: to cover travel costs

loans.name: Jamila

texts.en:
Jamila is married and has been blessed with four children. She rents a house that has electricity, but not piped water. 

For the past two years, she has operated a food stall business, selling household consumables to local customers. She faces a major challenge of high costs of transportation in her place of operation. 

With the KES 50,000 loan, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans, maize flour, and soft drinks for resale. She decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust to access loans, to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans, maize flour, and soft drinks for resale.

loans.name: Nergui

texts.en:
Mrs.Nergui is 36 years old and lives with her husband and seven children in Ger, in Nalaih district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband, Bayarbat, is 37 years old and works at a local company. All her children are under 18 years of age and go to local schools and kindergarten. 

Nergui has been attending trainings and courses provided by NGOs and other free-training providers over the years. She started her business of felt production, at home, in 2006. She now runs an organic vegetable growing and sales business on her plot of land in a greenhouse and also provides tailoring services at home. 

She is a hard-working, innovative, and enthusiastic woman who needs MNT 3,000,000 to purchase insulation material and construction material to finish building the house and to stay warm with her big happy family during the winter.

loans.use: to purchase insulation material and construction material to finish building her house and stay warm with her big happy family during the winter.

loans.name: Rami

texts.en:
Rami is a 32-year-old married man from Rafah city. He lives in a small home with his wife and four children: two sons and two daughters. Rami is an employee in the public sector with a low wage, which is not enough to cover all the necessary needs of the family. 

Rami took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help Rami to buy a new laptop. He dreams in the future of taking a bigger loan to start his own project.

Rami appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop

loans.name: Saja

texts.en:
Saja is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Saja is a 23-year-old married woman and a mother of one son and one daughter. 

For the past three years, Saja's husband has been operating a car wash located next to the main street where there is good traffic. This has been a profitable project and the only source of income for him.

Saja is requesting a USD loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing a new washing machine for cars. This will attract more customers and increase the car wash's capacity to wash more cars. This will increase their income.

loans.use: to buy a new car-washing machine

loans.name: Luz Margarita

texts.es:
Luz, de 45 años de edad, es una mujer visionaria y con muchos deseos de trabajar para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. 
Desde su casa elabora toda clase de comidas rápidas, las cuales han ganado popularidad en su barrio gracias a la calidad en el servicio. Con el fin de seguir creciendo en el sector, Luz se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un microondas, una nevera pequeña y surtido que le permitirán aumentar las ventas y  satisfacer la demanda en el sector. 
Sueña con garantizarles a sus tres hijos una educación de calidad y mejores oportunidades de vida.
texts.en:
Luz is a visionary 45-year-old woman who is highly motivated to work to improve her family's standard of living.  In her home she makes all types of fast food.  Her business has become popular in her neighborhood thanks to the quality service she provides.  

With the goal of continuing to grow her business, Luz is seeking a loan so that she can invest in a microwave oven and a small refrigerator.  She will also buy other supplies which will enable her to increase her sales and satisfy her customers.

She dreams of being able to guarantee her three children a quality education and better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to purchase a microwave oven, a refrigerator and food products.

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima is a widowed mother of 10 children who are now adults. She lives at her own house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and electricity bills. 

For the past 10 years, she has operated a business renting utensils like plates, spoons and ovens to her customers during weddings and other occasions. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a shop for the business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting for KSHS 20,000, she wants to purchase more utensils to rent. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more utensils and ovens to rent

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 23-year-old single man from Rafah city. He works in a coffee shop and earns a low income. Ahmad would like to improve his home and his living conditions by buying all the necessary home appliances the family doesn't have.
 
Ahmad took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help Ahmad to buy all the necessary home appliances and maybe in the future, he will take another loan to improve the living conditions in the family house.

Ahmad appears in the photo where he bought the home appliances.

loans.use: to buy some necessary home appliances

loans.name: María Matilde

texts.es:
María de 50 años de edad, se dedica a la confección de ropa, gracias al apoyo de su familia quien le brindó la oportunidad de capacitarse en este oficio. Gracias a su experiencia y la calidad en el servicio, esta mujer es hoy una de las más cotizadas en su municipio para la elaboración de vestidos y trajes. 
Afirma que su trabajo se ha convertido en su gran pasión, el cual representa un mundo lleno de creatividad y estilo.
En la actualidad  María busca expandirse debido al crecimiento que ha tenido en los últimos años, motivo que la ha impulsado a solicitar un crédito para realizar adecuaciones locativas e invertir en la compra de insumos necesarios para el desarrollo de su actividad. Sueña con mejorar la calidad de vida de su hogar y garantizarle a su hija de 20 años el acceso a la educación superior.
texts.en:
María, 50 years old, makes a living producing clothing. She received much support from her family when she learned this trade. Thanks to her experience and the quality service she provides, María is one of the most frequented seamstresses around her town. she affirms that her job has become her passion: for María making dresses and suits represents a world of creativity and style. 

Currently, María is looking to expand her business because of the increasing demand from customers that she has see during the last few years. For this reason, she is requesting a loan. She will do some renovations and invest in the purchase of necessary supplies for her business. 

María dreams of improving the quality of life at home and providing her 20-year-old daughter with access to a higher education.

loans.use: to pay for some renovations and to buy supplies such as thread and fabric.

loans.name: Bindu

texts.en: Please meet 33-year-old Bindu from Buchanan. Buchanan is the capital city of Grand Bassa County and is located by the sea. It is well-known for its beaches and its delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, a cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city speak Bassa, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. She completed grade 8, and she is married. She describes herself as a hard-working woman. Her spouse works as a security provider. They have three children, ages from 5 to 17. They are in school and live at home. Annie has a shop where she sells soap, lappa (traditional fabric) and clothes, such as blouses, T-shirts, and jeans. She has been in business for 10 years and works from Monday to Saturday, nine hours per day. With this loan, she will buy inventory. One of the greatest challenges that she faces is low income. She transports her goods by shared taxi. She started her business with money from her husband. She is proud of her business because of the profit she makes. Her future plan is to build a house. She thanks you in advance for your support!

loans.use: to buy inventory for her business selling soap, lappa (traditional fabric) and clothes, such as blouses, T-shirts, and jeans.

loans.name: Angeline

texts.en:
Angeline is a 24-year-old business woman from Liberia. She is single and has two children, ages 5 and 3. They are currently attending school and live at home. She had completed grade twelve before starting her business. She describes herself as a hardworking woman.

She lives and works in Buchanan, which is located by the sea and is the capital city of Grand Bassa County. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 

Angeline has had a table business which sells cosmetics, such as body perfume, body cream, roll-on, etc., for the past three years. She works from 7:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. each day at her business. Her greatest challenge in business is less income. She intends to use the loan to buy more goods. 

She started her business by selling for her mother. She likes her business because it helps to support her home. She hopes to one day own a house.  

Angeline wants to thank the Kiva lenders in advance for their help.

loans.use: to buy more goods for her cosmetics business.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.en:
Rustam is 28 years old. He is a very clever man. He graduated from school with excellence and good marks. He was one of the best pupils at his school. He likes math, computers, geography and other subjects. 

Five years ago, he entered the Tajikistan Commerce University, in the faculty of economics. He is married and has three children. Rustam wants to be one of the best economists in his region. He is purposeful and hardworking. 

He is asking for a loan of 250 USD to pay for study at the university. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is 37 year old and lives and works in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County, which is located by the sea. It is well known for its beaches and its delicious fish. Many logging companies are based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, a cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city speak Bassa, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. She lives with her husband and five children, between the ages of 12 and 20, only two of whom are in school and live at home. She been selling soft drinks for the past five years. She is applying for a loan to buy more goods for her business. She likes her business because it helps to support her household. She hopes one day to own a house. She wants to thank the Kiva lenders in advance for their help.

loans.use: to buy more soft drinks to sell in her business.

loans.name: Dawod

texts.en: Dawod is a 39-year-old married man with four sons and seven daughters. He lives in a small house near Ramallah. Dawod works as a bus driver for a kindergarten. This is the only source of income for the family. Dawod would like to finish building his new home, to improve the family’s living conditions. Dawod applied for a USD 2,000 loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to complete his new home by buying some construction materials, such as cement and tiles. Dawod was photographed in his new home.

loans.use: to buy some construction materials for his new home

loans.name: Sheirlein Yessenia

texts.es:
Sheirlein es una joven de 18 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido, sus atractivos turísticos y sobre todo por su variada gastronomía. Sheirlein  ha pasado por muchos momentos difíciles, asimismo debido a problemas económicos solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de secretariado.

Cada día Sheirlein trabaja como obrera de campo, ella trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a su madre con los gastos del hogar; Cheirlein cree que está saliendo adelante porque le pone mucho empeño y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de progresar.

Sheirlein está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá  comprar golosinas al por mayor, asimismo comprar una vitrina y un pequeño mostrador ya que iniciar un pequeño negocio de venta de golosinas  para que su madre pueda atenderlo y con ello tener un ingreso mas para el hogar, así ella Sheirlein podrá seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Estudiar la carrera de Secretariado y apoyar a sus hermanos en su educación”.
texts.en:
Sheirlein is an 18-year-old woman who lives in the city of Nazca, which is characterized by its warm climate, its tourist attractions, and most of all by its diverse cuisine.  

Sheirlein has been through many difficult times.  For financial reasons she was only able to complete the fifth grade of elementary school, but she would have like to have studied to become a professional secretary.

She works every day as a laborer in the fields, working around nine hours per day.  With the fruit of her labor she supports her mother in the household expenses.  She believes that she is making progress because she puts forth a lot of effort, and above all because she is highly motivated to succeed.

Sheirlein is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support she will be able to buy candy at wholesale.  She will also purchase a display case and a small counter top, since she has already started a small business selling candy, which her mother can tend to.  This will lead to increased income for the household and enable her to keep fighting every day for her greatest dream: to study to become a professional secretary and support her siblings in their education.

loans.use: to purchase candy at wholesale, as well as a display case and a counter top.

loans.name: Uba

texts.en: Uba is married and has two school-going children. They live in a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are for food and school fees for the children. She has operated a business selling khangas (women’s wrap cloths), which she sells from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of lack of capital to expand her business, as well as competition from her fellow sellers. With the loan she is requesting, she wants to buy two bales of khangas for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to buy two bales of khangas (women's wrap cloths) for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle for community health work

loans.name: Fredi Omar

texts.es:
Fredi, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, los cuales tienen edades de 3, 11 y 18 años, también una sobrina. El se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol,  crianza de cerdos, oficio que lo aprendió de su padre desde su niñez; la ventaja que cuando la cosecha es favorable puede vender de la cosecha adquirida y los ingresos le sirve para los gastos del hogar.
El crédito que requiere le permitirá comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios para el cultivo tales como: abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas, herbicidas; asimismo concentrado para los cerdos; este le ayudara al crecimiento de los cerdos de una manera más notable y tener los materiales agrícolas para llevar a cabo el cultivo.
Su sueño es brindarle el estudio a sus hijos y a futuro ampliar mas el negocio para que este genere mejores utilidades, con ello lograr una mayor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fredi lives with his wife and his three children, who are 3, 11, and 18 years old, as well as a niece. He grows corn and beans and raises pigs, which he learned from his father since his childhood. The advantage is that when the harvest is good he can sell it and the income covers the household expenses.

The loan he needs will allow him to buy agricultural supplies necessary for the crops such as fertilizer, herbicide, pesticide, and insecticide, as well as feed for the pigs. This will help his pigs to grow considerably larger and he will have the agricultural materials to grow the crops.

His dream is to provide his children the chance to study and in the future to expand the business more so that it will generate better earnings, and with that achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide, pesticide, and insecticide, as well as feed for the pigs

loans.name: María Eugenia

texts.es:
María a sus 49 años de edad se dedica a la venta de productos de la canasta familiar, en una pequeña tienda que ha ido construyendo a través de su esfuerzo y sacrificio. Trabaja diariamente de 7:00 a.m. hasta las 9:00 pm. En la actualidad desea comprar surtido, con el fin de aumentar sus ventas y garantizarles a sus dos hijos de 19 y 17 años de edad el acceso a la educación superior. 
Asegura que con dicha inversión mejoraran sus ingresos. Sueña con expandir su negocio y convertirse en una fuente generadora de empleo para su comunidad.
texts.en:
María is 49 and has a small grocery store, which she built through her own effort and sacrifice.  She works every day from 7 am to 9 pm.  At present she wants to resupply her store, with the goal of increasing her sales.  This in turn will ensure that her children, aged 17 and 19, will have access to higher education.

She is certain that with this investment she will be able to increase her income. She dreams of expanding her business and turning it into a source of employment for her community.

loans.use: to buy groceries for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide, pesticide, and insecticide, as well as threads to make hammocks

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en:
Theresa is 38 years old and lives and works in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County which is located by the sea. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu: cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city speak Bassa, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia.

Theresa lives with her husband and six children who are between the ages of 18 and 2. Three of them are in school. She has been selling fish for the past 15 years, from Monday to Saturday from 7am to 7pm. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish for her business. She hopes to own her own house and to be able to take care of her children.

loans.use: to purchase more fish for her business.

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie is 40 years old and lives and works in Buchanan, which is the capital city of Grand Bassa County and is located by the sea. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu: cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city speak Bassa, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia.

Annie lives with her husband and six children who are between the ages of 25 and 14. Only one of her children is in school. Annie has been selling dry and fresh fish for the past 17 years. She works from 7am to 6pm everyday.  Her greatest challenge in business is less income. She intends to use the loan to buy more fish. She started her business by selling for her mother. She likes her business because it helps to support her home. She hopes to one day to own a house. She wants to thank the Kiva lenders in advanced for their help.

loans.use: to buy more fish.

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie is 28 years old and lives and works in Buchanan, which is located by the sea and is the capital city of Grand Bassa County. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia.

Annie lives with her husband, who sells drinks, and two children, aged 13 and 5, who are in school. She has been selling slippers for the past six years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more goods for her business. She likes her business because it helps to support her home. She hopes to one day own a house.  

She wants to thank the Kiva lenders in advance for their help.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her business.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is married and has three children, all of whom attend school. Thanks to their efforts, she and her husband have been able to raise their children and help them become good people.

Mwanasiti is a designer and has a boutique where she sells exclusive clothing at a shopping center in Likoni. Mwanasiti has been in this line of work for more than 10 years. Since she has her own shop, she has many customers in the area and from Likoni where she is well known. Thanks to her business, she is able to move forward, maintain her home, and pay for any unforeseen expenses.

loans.use: to remodel her boutique.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a 38-year-old business woman from Liberia. She is married and has six children between 22 and 1.  Three are currently attending school, and they all live at home. She had completed grade twelve before starting her business. She describes herself as a hardworking woman.

She lives and works in Buchanan, which is located by the sea and is the capital city of Grand Bassa County. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia.

Rose has a table business and has been selling bread, fruits, etc. for the past ten years. She works from 7:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. each day at her business. Her greatest challenge in business is less income. 

Rose intends to use the loan to buy more inventory. She started her business by selling for her mother. She likes her business because it helps to support her home. She hopes to one day own a house.  

She wants to thank the Kiva lenders in advance for their help.

loans.use: to buy more inventory.

loans.name: Mitzy

texts.es: Mitzy, de 28 años de edad, está casada con Carlos quien es empleado y padre de su único hijo de 4 años de edad. Vive en compañía de su esposo y su pequeño hijo en su casa propia la cual es fruto de su esfuerzo.Mitzy se dedica a vender comidas variadas tales como guisos, pollo al horno, pan con pollo, pan con queso y otros. Posee este gran don y es conocida como una de las mujeres que tiene la sazón más exquisita de su centro de labores. Tiene un cafetín instalado dentro de un centro universitario reconocido de la ciudad y es uno de los más concurridos de la zona ya que sus clientes acuden a diario hacia ella para degustar los deliciosos almuerzos que prepara con tanto esmero y cariño. Realiza este trabajo hace 2 años con ayuda de algunos miembros de su familia.Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es preparar sus potajes, disfrutar de los aromas y sabores y saber que sus fieles comensales disfrutan de cada comida que ofrece además espera continuar con su actividad e implementarlo con algunos utensilios.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2000 soles y está muy contenta por el apoyo financiero que recibe para continuar con su trabajo.Con el dinero solicitado comprará ingredientes que utiliza a diario para preparar sus comidas tales como panes, carnes, condimentos, arroz, aceite y verduras.
texts.en:
Mitzy, 28, is married to Carlos who is employed and the father of her only son who is four-years-old.  She lives with her husband and little boy in her own house that was the result of her efforts.  Mitzy works selling various dishes like stews, roasted chicken, bread with chicken, bread with cheese and others.  She has a great gift and is well-known for being a woman with the tastiest dishes where she works.  She has a small snack bar located in a well-known university center in the city that’s one of the busiest in the zone since her customers come by every day to enjoy the delicious lunches she prepares with so much dedication and love.

She’s been doing this work for two years with help from some family members.  What she likes best about the work is preparing her dishes, to enjoy the aromas and flavors and to know that her faithful customers enjoy every meal she offers.  She hopes to continue with her activity and to equip it with some utensils.

On this occasion she will ask for 2,000 soles and she’s very happy for the financial support she’ll get to continue with her work.  She will use the requested money to buy ingredients like bread, meat, condiments, rice, oil and vegetables she uses daily to prepare her meals.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like bread, meat, condiments, etc.

loans.name: Fatima Leonor

texts.es:
La cliente Fatima vive en Guayaquil, comenzó su negocio hace 6 años atrás cuando comenzó a cocinar para sus vecinos. Poco a poco siguió en el negocio de comida hasta la actualidad que hace almuerzos. 

En la actualidad hace almuerzos como sopa y almuerzos (platos fuertes) variados. Trabaja desde las 07:30am hasta las 19:00pm todos los días para vender las comidas en su local.

Tiene muchas aspiraciones en su negocio por eso quiere seguir vendiendo comida, pero el préstamo va a estar destinado para sus tres hijos comprarles utiles escolares, cuadernos, etc.
texts.en: Fátima lives in Guayaquil and started her business six years ago when she started cooking for her neighbors.  She continued with her business and has grown the present when she makes lunches.  She currently prepares lunches like soup and various lunches (main courses).  She works every day from 7:30am until 7pm to sell the meals in her locale.  She has many hopes for her business which is why she wants to continue selling food but the loan this time will be used to buy school supplies, notebooks, etc. for her children.

loans.use: to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia es una mujer muy trabajadora y sobre todo una madre amorosa, ya que a pesar de las adversidades y con el apoyo de su esposo lucha cada día para sacar adelante a su hijo de 5 años de edad, quien actualmente se encuentra estudiando el nivel inicial. Lucia anteriormente trabajaba como obrera en los fundos de su ciudad, pero luego de mucho esfuerzo y ahorro, logro iniciar su pequeño de venta de ropa, artículos de bazar, entre otros y con este negocio poco a poco está saliendo adelante y sobre todo inicio su negocio porque nació su hija a quien adora muchísimo y quien la inspira cada día para salir adelante. Lucia trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día ya que recorre las casa de los habitantes de su barrio y ofrece sus productos de esta manera y gracias a ello puede solventar los gastos de su hogar.

Lucia está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio como ropa para niños, entre otros lo que le permitirá poder tener variedad de productos y ofrecerlos en la campaña del día de la madre, así mejorara sus ingresos y podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hija y poder tener una gran negocio”.
texts.en:
Lucía’s a very hardworking woman but above all a loving mother because despite adversities with help from her husband she strives daily to move her five-year-old child forward; she’s currently at the beginning stage of his schooling.  Lucía used to work as a laborer on large agricultural estates in her city but after much effort and savings she was able to start her small business selling clothes and household items, among others and with this business is gradually getting ahead.  Everything started because her child who she loves very much was born and she’s inspired daily to get ahead.  Lucía works about nine hours daily going from house to house in her neighborhood offering her goods.  It’s in this way and thanks to it that she’s able to cover her household expenses.

Lucía is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support they’ve given her she will be able to buy more merchandise for her business like children’s clothes, among others, that will allow her to have a variety of products to sell for Mother’s Day.  She will thus improve her income and be able to continue striving to make her greatest dream reality: to give her daughter a good education and to be able to have a great business.

loans.use: to buy children's clothes.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
Marcelina tiene 52 años de edad , es viuda  y tiene 03 hijos con quienes vive en su casa construida a base de adobe.Marcelina se dedica netamente a la agricultura , realiza su labor en una parcela que compro hace 22 años , el cual le sirvió para mantener a sus hijos y ahorrar para comprar otra parcela y seguir sembrando.
Tiene más plantaciones de cacao porque es un producto con mucha demanda en su zona y requiere menos cuidado a diferencia de otros productos zonales.
Para obtener buenas cosechas al finalizar la campaña debe mantener sus productos muy cuidados y eso solo es posible con ayuda de trabajadores del lugar quienes le ayudan en las distintas tareas como el retiro de maleza, fumigación y finalmente la cosecha. Posteriormente vende sus productos a los compradores de la zona que otorgan el precio final de acuerdo a la calidad que poseen los granos de cacao seco.
Al tener muchos años trabajando con este producto ha notado que varios de sus árboles en su terreno están desfasados y no pueden dar frutos siendo necesarios reemplazarlos para no disminuir la producción de las futuras campañas.Desea con el tiempo comprar otra parcela y a futuro heredarlo a su hijo mayor quien aun no posee un negocio fijo, por otro lado desea trabajar hasta lograr que sus hijos menores sigan estudiando hasta convertirse en profesionales.Es el tercer préstamo con KIVA y agradece el apoyo financiero brindado para seguir adelante.Desea contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para comprar plantas de almácigo y reemplazar los árboles desfasados de sus parcelas cacaoteras.
texts.en:
Marcelina is 52 years old.  She is a widow with three children, and they live in an adobe home.  Marcelina is engaged exclusively in farming and carries out her work on a plot of land that she bought twenty-two years ago.  It is helping her support her children and save to buy another plot of land as well as continue sowing.  She has many cacao plantings because this product is in great demand in the area and requires less care, unlike other products grown in the area.  

To obtain good harvests at the end of the growing season, she must be very careful to maintain her products, and that is only possible with the help of laborers that assist her with various tasks such as weed removal, fumigation, and ultimately, the harvest.  Later, she sells her products to area buyers, who offer the final prices according to the quality of the dry cacao beans.

Having worked with this product for many years, she has observed that the trees on her land are barren and cannot bear fruit.  It is necessary to replace them so as not to diminish future harvests.  In time, she wishes to purchase another plot of land and in the future, leave it to her eldest son, who still doesn’t have a regular job.  On the other hand, she wishes to work so that her children can remain is school and become professionals.  This is her third loan with Kiva and she is grateful for their assistance in helping her move forward.  She wishes to have 1,000 nuevos soles to purchase seedlings and replace the barren trees on her cacao plots.
.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings.

loans.name: Jose Lucas

texts.es:
José, requiere optar por un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de mas capital de trabajo para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio; este le permitirá comprar abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas y asimismo repuestos para el mini taller de reparación de bicicletas.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a tener los insumos necesarios para realizar el cultivo y algunos repuestos; las condiciones económicas han mejorado, ya que los ingresos incrementaron y las circunstancias familiares se mantienen igual.
texts.en:
José needs to opt for a new loan because he needs more working capital to continue investing in his business; it will make it possible for him to buy manure, herbicide, insecticide, pesticide, fungicide and also to buy spare parts for his small bicycle repair shop.

The previous loan helped him have the necessary supplies to do his planting and also some spare parts.  His economic conditions have improved because his income increased and his family circumstances remain the same.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and spare parts.

loans.name: Magnolia Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cinco microempresarios de éxito una de ellas es María Elena quien tiene 64 años de edad, es soltera lleva 17 ciclos de préstamos en la institución inicio con montos muy pequeños y por su record crediticio ha ido en aumento los montos en la actualidad, de estar en la institución tiene dos años consecutivos, su negocio es la venta de comida ambulante, en los cuadros de beisbol cercano a su comunidad y en su domicilio con esta actividad tiene 25 años de tener su negocio. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como yuca, chicharrón, carne de pollo, carne de res, repollo, tomate, cebolla, vinagre, sal, arroz, frijol, azúcar, aceite etc. Mercedes tiene 66 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de verduras y frutas, Marina tiene 70 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de fritanga, Damarys tiene 41 Años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa y cosméticos, Idelfonso tiene 22 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa.
texts.en:
This group consists of five successful micro entrepreneurs.  One of them is María Elena who is 64-years-old.  She’s single and has had 17 loan cycles in the institution.  She started out with very small amounts and her credit history has led to the current amounts.  She’s been in the institution for two consecutive years.  Her business is selling food at her community’s baseball fields and at home.  She’s been in this business for 25 years.  She will invest the loan in the purchase of raw materials like manioc, pork, chicken, beef, cabbage, tomatoes, onions, vinegar, salt, rice, beans, sugar, oil, etc.

Mercedes is 66-years-old and sells fruit and vegetables, Marina’s 70-years-old and sells fried fast-food, Damarys, 41, sells clothes and cosmetics and Ildefonso, 22, sells clothes.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies.

loans.name: Alexandra

texts.es: Alexandra, de 22 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora, alegre, entusiasta y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Es soltera y no tiene hijos , actualmente vive en la casa de sus padres en compañía de ellos y sus dos hermanas. El negocio de Alexandra consiste en la venta de bebidas heladas como gaseosas, agua envasada y cerveza. Su local de atención esta establecido en la casa de sus padres. Tiene una congeladora donde acondiciona sus productos a temperaturas bajas para que sean muy refrescantes al momento de ser consumidas por sus clientes. Se animó a iniciar su negocio hace 2 años y cuenta con la ayuda de su madre quien se encarga de la atención de los clientes.Con el monto solicitado de S/. 1500 soles comprará bebidas tales como gaseosas, agua envasada, frugos y otros los cuales serán colocados en su tienda.
texts.en: Alexandra is 22 years old.  She is a hardworking, cheerful, enthusiastic woman with a strong desire to succeed.  She is single and has no children.  Currently, she lives in her parents’ home with her parents and two sisters.  Alexandra’s business consists of selling cold drinks such as soda, bottled water, and beer.  Her customer service area is set up in her parents’ home.  She has a freezer where she stores her products at low temperatures so that they are very refreshing when her customers are consuming them.  She encouraged herself to start her business two years ago and has the help of her mother, who is in charge of serving the customers.  She will use the S/. 1500 soles requested to purchase drinks such as sodas, bottled water, fruits, and other products that she will put in her store.

loans.use: to purchase carbonated drinks.

loans.name: Gisela Marilin

texts.es:
Gisela es una joven de 22 años de edad, vive al lado de sus padres en el distrito de Parcona, es madre de un pequeño de 1 año a quien quiere muchísimo y por quien trabaja cada día para poder ofrecerle una vida mejor. Es por ello que Gisela cada dia trabaja en una ferretería de su distrito como vendedora, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a sus padres y sacar adelante a su hijo, ya que el padre de su pequeño la abandono y ella se convirtió en padre y madre para el pequeño.

Gisela está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar medicamentos para su pequeño ya que se encuentra enfermo y los medicamentos son muy caros, de esta manera Gisela podrá curar a su pequeño y aliviar su preocupación; así poder trabajar con mayor tranquilidad, lo cual le permitirá seguir luchando y trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”Darle una profesión a su hijo y poder estudiar una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Gisela, 22, lives with her parents in the district of Parcona.  She's the mother of a small child, age 1, whom she loves very much and for whom she works every day so she can give him a better life. 

This is why Gisela works every day as a vendor in a hardware store in her district.  She works around eight hours a day and, with the fruit of her labor, helps her parents and gets her child ahead, because the father of her child abandoned her and she became both father and mother.

Gisela's very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their support she'll be able to buy medicine for her little one, who's sick and the medicine is very expensive.

This way Gisela will be able to cure her son and relieve her worry.  She'll be able to work more peacefully and continue striving and working to make her biggest dream come true: "To give her child a career and to be able to study in the university."

loans.use: to buy medicine

loans.name: Asha

texts.en: Asha is a hardworking person. This is her second loan with Kiva. She used the previous loan to purchase charcoal for her shop, and this enabled her to serve her customers and also fill her orders. She says that she wants to continue working because this is the only way she can help her family and provide them with what they need to continue growing. She requests this loan to purchase sacks of charcoal, which will enable her to expand her product offerings and continue to meet customer demand. She is grateful for this new assistance.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en: Fatuma makes a living cooking and selling delicious food and thanks to her previous Kiva loan, she has been able to continue with her business. She is a very hardworking woman who is dedicated to her business and supporting her family. Thanks to her previous loan, Fatuma has expanded and improved her overall business as well as the quality of her products. She plans to use the support from this loan to purchase flour, starch, yeast, eggs and other ingredients for making her delicious food. She is very grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase flour, starch, yeast, eggs and other ingredients

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en: Hellen is married and has two children, both of whom attend school and are under her care. She rents a house that has electricity but no piped water. For over six years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby and even at the market. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business and also competition from fellow sellers. With the loan that she is requesting she wants to purchase 3 bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase 3 bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is a hardworking and enterprising woman who is getting ahead and making an effort to grow. She says that she has good experience in this area because she has been doing this for a long time. She also says that the previous Kiva loan allowed her to make many improvements and continue to grow. Esther’s goal is to continue expanding her business. She is asking for this loan to buy merchandise such as cosmetics and other things for her store so she can continue her sales. She is grateful for this new opportunity.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell such as cosmetics and other things.

loans.name: Asha

texts.en: Asha is a business woman. She is married to a businessman. They have three young children, all of whom attend school. She began in sales thanks to help from her husband, who is employed. Little by little Asha began increasing her sales since she herself goes out to offer her products in the area. She sells mostly clothing for women and children like blouses, shorts, undergarments, t-shirts and sweatshirts. One of her great dreams is to have her own store in the city center. She is asking for a loan to purchase seasonal clothing. This will help her greatly with her sales.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Gilberto, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos los cuales tienen edades de 4, 13 y 15 años, todos dependen de su negocio. El se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos  y a la crianza de cerdos, el oficio lo aprendió desde muy pequeño con su padre, la desventaja  es que tiene que  pagar mano de obra para llevarlo a cabo, ya que es bastante lo que cultiva. 
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar  abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas y asimismo adquirir dos cerdos; este le ayudara a realizar una mejor siembra y con los cerdos obtener ingresos, ya que los vende cuando han crecido.
Su sueño es construir una mejor casa para brindarle una mayor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Gilberto lives with his wife and their three children aged 4, 13 and 15. The entire family depends on his business. He makes a living from cultivating basic grains and raising pigs. He learned this business with his father from the time he was very young. The disadvantage he faces is that he has to pay for labor to carry out his work, as he cultivates quite a bit.

The loan that he requires will allow him to buy fertilizer, herbicides, pesticides and also to acquire two pigs. This will help him to sow his crops better and to obtain earnings with the pigs, as he sells them once they have grown.

His dream is to construct a better house to provide his family with a greater quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, pesticides and also two pigs

loans.name: Dios Con Nosotros Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Mireya tiene 39 años de edad, soltera y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y sandalias actividad que viene realizando desde hace cuatro años, tiene un hijo y su mercadería la vende a su comunidad, vecinos, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de ropa como pantalón de varón Levy, pantalón cristal de mujer, pantalón jingo, blusas, camisa sport, sandalia plataforma etc. Gilma tiene 28 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos y Karla tiene 32 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos y ropa interior.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three enterprising members.  One of them is Mireya, 39.  She's single and has one child.  Her business is selling new clothing and sandals, a job she has done for four years.  She sells her merchandise to her community and neighbors.

She'll invest the loan in buying clothing such as men's Levi's, dress pants for women, Jingo-brand pants, blouses, sport shirts, platform sandals, etc.

Gilma, 28, sells cosmetics.  Karla, 32, sells cosmetics and underwear.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Naom

texts.en:
Naom lives in the Kisii area of Kenya, which is not far from Masai land. She has 5 children and has been farming for 30 years.  Her primary income sources are milk and crops.

She stated what is most enjoyable about farming: 'Cattle keeping and farming.' Her biggest challenge is 'Climate change and diseases.' Animals on the farm have been given the names of 'Nyasanako.'

Naom was asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which she replied: 'Because of farming.'  This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session: 'The services they offer.'

Her highest monthly expense is school fees. When asked how this loan will benefit her family, Naom replied 'To cater for family exepenses.'

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Naom owns the following: 'cow, poultry, pump' but does not own 'pig, bicycle, motorcycle, automobile.' Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household 'mosquito net, electricity, TV, DVD' but does not have 'solar power, running water, sewing machine.'

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and sent the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down.

loans.use: To purchase a water tank

loans.name: Biasha

texts.en:
Biasha lives with her husband and five school-age children.

Biasha has a sewing workshop in her home. She takes on jobs from her customers who are located in the market district. Her husband and children help her in the business. She says that she previously used to sell food in the market, and her husband worked in a factory, but when the sewing business gradually took off they started working in it full time.

Biasha is requesting this loan to invest in her sewing workshop. She will buy fabric, thread, buttons and other supplies so that she can continue growing and improving her family's quality of life.

loans.use: buy fabric, thread, buttons and other supplies.

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en:
Comfort is a 34-year-old and lives and works in Buchanan, which is located by the sea and is the capital city of Grand Bassa County. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia.

Comfort lives with her husband and four children between the ages of 15 and 1; three are in school. Comfort was educated to grade nine. She has been selling pepper, oil, rice, salt, etc. for the past ten years in the local market. She is requesting a loan to purchase more goods for her business. She likes her business because it helps to support her home. She hopes to one day own a house.  

She wants to thank the Kiva lenders in advance for their help.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her business.

loans.name: Lizbeth

texts.es: Lizbeth, de 37 años de edad está casada y tiene 4 hijos, vive junto a toda su familia en una cómoda casa que alquila por un pago mensual, desde ahí trabaja todos los días para mejorar su ingresos económicos y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.El trabajo de Lizbeth, consiste en la venta de cosméticos, vende todo tipo de artículos mediante el sistema de venta por catálogo o exhibición ya que tiene una vitrina en su casa por donde llegan los clientes en busca de perfumes, talcos, cremas, desodorantes o algún accesorio de utilidad. Lleva en esta actividad un poco más de 4 años, trabaja sola y gana muy bien. Por lo pronto, continúa trabajando en la venta de cosméticos y le gusta lo que hace además afirma que sus ganancias económicas están aseguradas con los clientes que ya ha logrado consolidar con el paso de los años, espera seguir trabajando y expandir su negocio para continuar progresando ya que desea brindarles a sus hijos la oportunidad de acceder a una educación de calidad a través de una carrera profesional.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500 soles por tanto agradece la oportunidad que le brindan para acceder al crédito que necesita para continuar con el logro de sus metas.Con el monto solicitado comprará principalmente cosméticos como talcos, cremas, perfumes y otros accesorios.
texts.en: Lizbeth, who is 37 years old, is married and has 4 children. She lives with her entire family in a comfortable house that they rent for a monthly payment. From there, she works every day to improve her economic income and to be able to have a better quality of life. Lizbeth's work consists of selling cosmetics. She sells every type of article through a system of catalog sales or by exhibition, since she has a display case in her house, where customers come in search of perfumes, powders, creams, deodorants, or some useful accessory. She has had this business for a little more than four years. She works alone and earns very well. For now, she continues working in the sale of cosmetics, and she likes what she does. Furthermore, she states that her economic earnings are assured with the customers that she has managed to establish with the passing of the years. She hopes to continue working and expand her business to continue progressing, since she wants to offer her children the opportunity to access a quality education and have a professional career. At this time, she is requesting 500 PEN. Therefore she is grateful for the opportunity that is offered to her to access the loan that she needs to continue with the achievement of her goals. With the amount she has applied for, she will buy principally cosmetics such as powders, creams, perfumes, and other accessories.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics such as creams, perfumes, powders, etc.

loans.name: María Fabiola

texts.es:
María tiene 54 años de edad y siempre ha soñado con crear su propio negocio, pero debido a su condición económica y las múltiples obligaciones, debió hacer frente a otras prioridades. Laboró por más de 10 años en varios talleres de confección en donde se ganaba la vida y generaba los ingresos para el sostenimiento de sus tres hijos. 
Hoy esta mujer desea iniciar con la materialización de su sueño, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una máquina ojaladora y otra botonadora.
Sueña con ver crecer su negocio y en el mediano plazo, proporcionándole a su comunidad la oportunidad de acceder a un empleo digno.
texts.en:
Maria is 54 years old. She has always dreamed of opening her own business but due to her financial condition and multiple obligations, she had to face other priorities. She worked for over 10 years in different tailoring workshops where she made her living and generated the income to support her three children.
Now Maria wishes to start making her dream come true, which is why she is asking for a loan. She will invest the money in the purchase of a sewing machine that makes buttonholes and a sewing machine that attaches buttons.
She hopes to see her business grow, and in the medium term, she hopes to be able to give her community the opportunity of getting a decent job.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine that makes buttonholes and a machine that sews buttons.

loans.name: Edi Wilfredo

texts.es:
Edi Wilfredo tiene 25 años de edad y vive en la ciudad de Pilcopata, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que sale adelante. Su actividad económica principal es la agricultura y la venta de  madera. Desde hace varios años que pertenece al banco comunal “Chacoq” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar madera. 

(La ciudad de Pilcopata es la capital del distrito de Kosñipata dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Edi Wilfredo is 25-years-old and lives in the city of Pilcopata.   He’s a hardworking, enterprising man who is moving ahead.  His main economic activity is agriculture and selling lumber.  He’s been a member of the “Chacoq” communal bank for several years and on this occasion needs the loan to buy lumber.

(The city of Pilcopata is the capital of Kosñipata District in Paucartambo Province in Cusco Department, Peru.)

loans.use: to buy lumber.

loans.name: Patricia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Patricia, tiene 50 años de edad, vive en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas para obtener ingresos y aportar para la familia; este oficio lo aprendió por iniciativa propia y lo lleva a cabo desde hace 2 años y lo realiza solo tres días por semana de 4:00pm a 7:00pm.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar quesillo, carne, tomates, repollo, aceite, chicharrón, entre otros insumos necesarios para la elaboración de pupusas; este le ayudara a incrementar la capacidad de inversión  y aumentar la clientela, asimismo las utilidades.
Su sueño es fortalecer el negocio para obtener mayores ingresos y así tener una vivienda más digna.
texts.en:
Patricia, who is 50 years old, lives in her own house. Her work is selling pupusas (a typical Salvadoran dish) to obtain income and support her family. She learned this work on her own initiative, and she has been doing it for 2 years. She does it only three days a week from 4:00 pm to 7:00 pm.

The loan that she needs will allow her to buy fresh cheese, meat, tomatoes, cabbage, oil, and pork rinds, among other necessary ingredients to make pupusas. This will help her to expand her investment capacity and increase her clientele, as well as her profits. 

Her dream is to strengthen her business to obtain greater income and thus have a more dignified life.

loans.use: to buy fresh cheese, meat, tomatoes, cabbage, oil, and pork rinds, among other items.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
Iván de 60 años de edad, trabaja en su propia tienda desde hace más de 8 años, después de un recorte de personal en el que salió despedido. Razón que lo motivó a crear su propio negocio y sacar su familia adelante. Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de  productos de la canasta familiar con el propósito de mejorar su inventario, aumentando la fidelización de sus clientes y mejorando sus ingresos, lo que contribuirá a mejorar la calidad de vida en su hogar. 
Asegura que aunque la condición económica es un factor importante para su estabilidad, quien garantiza su felicidad es el amor de su familia.
texts.en:
Iván is 60 years old. He has worked in his own store for more than 8 years, after a reduction in personal when he was laid off. This motivated him to start his own business and get his family ahead. Right now, he is asking for a loan to invest in buying staple products with the purpose of improving his inventory. This will increase his customers' loyalty and improve his income, which will contribute to a better quality of life in his home.

He affirms that although his financial condition is an important factor for his stability, what guarantees his happiness is the love of his family.

loans.use: to buy staple products.

loans.name: Bernardino

texts.es:
Bernardino nació en el distrito de Challabamba pero vive en la comunidad de Majopata anexo de la comunidad de Carnicero. (La comunidad de Majopata está ubicada en el distrito del Challabamba en la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú). 

Bernardino tiene 37 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de  la cual tiene cinco hijos, él es una persona trabajadora que desde muy temprana edad se dedica a la agricultura  y crianza de animales menores como cuyes y chanchos. Desde hace varios pertenece al banco comunal “El Balcon” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como cuyes.
texts.en:
Bernardino was born in Challabamba District but lives in the community of Majopata, an annex of Carnicero community.  (Majopata community is located in Challabamba District in Paucartambo Province within Cusco Department, Perú).

Constantino is 37-years-old and is in a common law relationship; he has five children.  He is a person who started working at a very young age.  He works in agriculture and raising small animals like pigs and guinea pigs.  He’s been a member of the “El Balcón” (The Balcony) communal bank for several years and on this occasion needs the loan to buy small animals like guinea pigs.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs..

loans.name: Jose Salvador

texts.es:
José, vive con su familia, sus padres y esposa, asimismo sus hijos, todos dependen del negocio. El se dedica a la elaboración de pan, tiene varios años de poseerlo y lo realiza todos los días de 5:00am a 3:00pm, luego sale a venderlo a sus clientes.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar harina, manteca, sal, azúcar,  bandejas, entre otros insumos necesarios para realizar dicha actividad; este le ayudara  a fortalecer el negocio y así obtener mayores ingresos.
Su sueño es  incrementar las utilidades, ampliar la panadería y así darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
José lives with his parents, his wife, and his children; everyone depends on the business. He makes bread, and has had his bakery for several years. He works every day from 5:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m., then goes out to sell to his customers. 

The loan he is requesting will allow him to buy flour, lard, salt, sugar, trays and other necessary supplies for carrying on this business. This will help him to build up the business and so obtain greater income. 

His dream is to increase profits, expand the bakery, and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy flour, lard, salt, sugar, trays and other supplies.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie is 33 years old and lives and works in Buchanan, the capital City of Grand Bassa County, located by the sea.  It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. Marie lives there with her husband and two children, ages 11 and 1; only one is in school. Marie stopped her education at 12th.

She has been selling charcoal for the past four years in the local market, and she is requesting a loan to purchase more goods for her business. She likes her business because it helps to support her home. She hopes to one day own a house.  

She wants to thank the Kiva lenders in advance for their help.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her business.

loans.name: Mwaka

texts.en:
Mwaka is a hardworking and enterprising woman who is getting ahead and making an effort to grow. She says that she has good experience in this area because she has been doing this for a long time. She also says that the previous Kiva loan allowed her to make many improvements and continue to grow. Mwaka’s goal is to continue expanding her business.

She is asking for this loan to buy merchandise, sacks of coconuts for resale, and other things for her store so she can continue her sales. She is grateful for this new opportunity.

loans.use: To buy merchandise, sacks of coconuts for resale, and other things for her store so she can continue her sales.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is 49 years old. She sells fruits and has been in the business for the past nineteen years. 

She wants the loan to buy more pineapples and tree tomatoes for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: to buy more fruit to sell.

loans.name: Tamaz

texts.en:
Tamaz, 37, lives in Kekhovani village, Adigeni district, with his wife Maia. Tamaz requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for family business startup, but without any success. His loan request was rejected every time, because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions. 
The family's main source of the income is from agricultural activities. In particular, they own a plot of land, where potatoes are grown. They also have five milk cows and ten calves. The family milks the cows every day to produce dairy products. The harvested potatoes and dairy products are sold to local retailers. 

Tamaz requested a loan from Credo to start up a family business. Tamaz has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The startup loan program envisages provision of business startup and re-startup credits with soft conditions to rural poor people who do not have access to credit products. These rural poor people are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low income. With his credit, Tamaz will purchase a minibus. He wants to start trading with potatoes and dairy products. Also when his calves are grown, Tamaz will be able to produce more dairy products.
